job_description_p: ['business function', '\xa0', '\xa0', "group technology and operations (t&o) enables and empowers the bank with an efficient, nimble and resilient infrastructure through a strategic focus on productivity, quality & control, technology, people capability and innovation. in group t&o, we manage the majority of the bank's operational processes and inspire to delight our business partners through our multiple banking delivery channels.", '\xa0', 'job purpose\xa0', '\xa0', 'dbs corebanking team is seeking a highly motivated, seasoned manager of infrastructure to transform and build out our corebanking’s existing infrastructure into cloud platform infrastructure.\xa0 this person will lead devops engineers as they design and deploy automation and configuration management tools needed to provide a secured, scalable, reliable and fast platform for both our infrastructure and application services.', '\xa0', '\xa0', 'the successful candidate will have extensive experience managing infrastructure for secured, global, large scale, highly available services.\xa0 technical and organizational vision, combined with flawless execution is critical to this role.\xa0 the role also requires strong partnership with engineering/development teams, production support, technical services support and vendors.', 'responsibilities\xa0', '\xa0']
job_description_li: ['as part of the corebanking leadership team, drive the platform transformation to private/public cloud', 'manage a team of infrastructure engineers to ensure the stability and high availability of infrastructure services for corebanking applications', 'build and foster a high performance culture, mentor team members and provide team with the tools and guidance to transform current infrastructure platform\xa0', 'design, build and deliver a stable and highly scalable infrastructure based on latest technologies and best practice\xa0', 'enhance performance throughout the infrastructure using automation framework and implement tooling to optimize performance, availability and costs', 'plan, lead and drive projects through entire lifecycle for infrastructure', 'create deployment strategies for existing and new services based on business objectives', 'foster collaborative partnerships across functional teams including remote teams']

job_description_p: ['head (data architect)', 'to architect, design and administer the whole-of-government (wog) enterprise data analytics platform (fi@gov) for the public sector finance and internal audit community.', 'the key objective of the agd-business analytics directorate is to transform the finance and audit processes through data analytics, and to drive a data-driven approach in decision making. this includes strengthening data analytics capabilities and competencies to strengthen governance, optimise resource management and drive productivity.', 'the key roles fulfilled by this job include to:', '\xa0', '\xa0', 'requirement', 'if you are shortlisted for the position, you should hear from us within 30 days of the closing date of the advertisement.\xa0']
job_description_li: ['administer the development and maintenance of the public sector finance data warehouse and data architecture. this includes developing and implementing best practices to ensure optimal data quality, integrity, governance and system performance.', 'drive data integration, data modelling, analytics and reporting deliverables in collaboration with business analysts and technology partners.', 'manage large scale development and deployment of big data infrastructure and platform;', 'review and govern design principles to ensure quality and performant design of dashboards and tools on the business intelligence platform powered by microstrategy.', 'plan and implement the data strategy and technology roadmap for the wog finance analytics platform. this includes monitoring emerging trends of data analytics technologies, including related technologies in the area of robotics and artificial intelligence, and propose the technology roadmap for adoption and application.', 'manage the deployment of advanced analytics applications with data pipelines integrated with the overall enterprise grade system architecture and infrastructure.', 'manage a team of data analyst and data scientist, overseeing related projects from end-to-end, including user requirement studies, prototyping, development, testing and deployment.', 'ensure proper documentation of the data warehouse and analytics platform, including design architecture, data schema, operations management procedures and system functional specifications.', 'good degree from a recognised university in computer science, computer engineering, information technology, or a related field.', 'at least 10 years of experience on enterprise data solutions and architecture', 'competency in microstrategy architecture is strongly preferred', 'a good understanding of big data technologies, with at least 3 years of experience in hadoop ecosystem', 'ability to independently architect and maintain a hybrid data platform, integrating hadoop with sql data warehouse', 'a good understanding of business intelligence tools and data science techniques like machine learning and text mining, with competency in open-source scripting language (e.g. r, python) is advantageous', 'experience in vendor management and project management is preferred', 'team player who can work well with stakeholders from different public agencies', 'self-motivated to learn and keeps up to date with the latest analytical technologies in the industry', 'confident communicator, with good writing and presentation skills']

job_requirement_li: ['bachelor degree and above in analytics, information systems management, computer science or related fields.', '7+ years of experience in data warehouse, data analytics projects, change management process, and/or any im (information management) related projects.', 'technical experience in data migration, data integration, data modeling, designing, building etls, data ingestions, and/or transformations.', 'experience in working with rdbms such as db2, oracle, microsoft sql server, postgressql, teradata, etc.', 'experience in data management and integration tool such as informatica data integrator, oracle data integrator, sap data services, ab initio, ibm datastage or microsoft ssis.', 'process good knowledge and experience in data quality definition, data cleansing and data treatment/profiling process using industry standard tools like informatica data quality, trillium software, sas data quality, sap data quality management, etc. is an advantage.', 'good knowledge of data warehouse and data management implementation methodology.', 'good knowledge of the information management framework, including operating model, data governance, data management, data security, data quality and data architecture.', 'preferably with experience in big data environments like cloudera and hortonworks.', 'knowledge or experience of cloud computing is advantageous.', 'process good knowledge and experience in data visualisation concepts using tools such as sas visual analytics or wrs, tableau, microsoft powerbi or reporting services, ibm cognos, sap businessobjects, etc. is an advantage.', 'ability to pick up new tools and able to be independent with minimal guidance from the project leads/managers.']

job_title: senior assistant director, survey design and analytics (manpower research and statistics department) - contract
job_description_p: ['role purpose', 'to design, plan, co-ordinate and manage large scale national surveys, including the development of data definitions, design of questionnaires, sample designs for households and establishment survey. to provide advisory on the data and statistical techniques that are suitable for the purpose of research as well as spotting erroneous interpretation or weakness in data analysis, and to study on different operation aspects to identify opportunities for improvements and productivity gains.', 'responsibilities', 'being part of a well-established manpower statistical agency, you will lead design, plan and manage large-scale national surveys. you will develop definitions for data items, train and guide staff on statistical coding and classification. through awareness of best practices supplemented by qualitative research, you will enhance operational and technological processes to keep pace with today’s fast-changing environment. in addition, the candidate is required to lead technology initiatives which aim to enhance survey processes and respondent’s experience. you will lead a team to chart and drive the data analytics strategy and build relevant models to conduct meaningful analysis. lastly, you are required to drive collection of new data and refinement of existing data sources, including steps to enhance quality of information recorded.', 'requirements']
job_description_li: ['tertiary qualification in any discipline', 'preferably 8 – 10 years of relevant experience in research and operations', 'preferably 5 years of relevant experience in understanding key concepts, techniques and considerations in machine learning and data analytics', 'excellent communication and interpersonal skills', 'strong analytical and critical-thinking skills', 'strong business acumen', 'proficient in statistical programming tools such as r, sas, and database querying language such as sql', 'experience in leading a team and ability to work under pressure and tight timelines']

skills: ['research', 'science', 'matlab', 'latex', 'algorithms', 'statistics', 'machine learning', 'teaching', 'data analysis', 'molecular biology', 'computer science', 'mathematical modeling', 'simulations', 'qualitative research', 'biochemistry', 'c++', 'data mining', 'programming', 'artificial intelligence', 'lifesciences']
job_description_p: ['the national university of singapore invites applications for a postdoctoral fellow in the data analytics core, anchored at the department of biochemistry, a member of the medical sciences cluster at the yong loo lin school of medicine. the medical sciences cluster comprises the departments of anatomy, biochemistry, microbiology & immunology, pharmacology, and physiology. the cluster conducts multidisciplinary research in biomedical sciences, focusing initially on 7 core areas: (1) neuroscience; (2) metabolic & cardiovascular diseases; (3) cancer; (4) immunobiology; (5) infectious disease and host-microbe interactions (6) drug discovery and optimisation; and (7) synthetic biology.', 'purpose of the post ', 'the postdoctoral fellow will be responsible to, and work closely with the principal investigator and team members to plan for and drive the establishment of the medical sciences data analytics core facility to support the multidisciplinary data analytic needs of investigator-led projects within the cluster', 'main duties and responsibilities \xa0', 'the postdoctoral fellow will be expected to:']
job_description_li: ['lead in the development and implementation of computational pipelines for the analysis of next-generation sequencing data (e.g. microbiomes, genomes, epigenomes, transcriptomes) as well as proteomic/metabolomics data.', 'lead in the development and implementation of statistical and machine learning tools for analysis of high dimensional datasets.', 'lead in the development and implementation of computational tools and databases to integrate biological and clinical datasets for functional analysis.', 'establish a data governance and project management workflow to manage the data and analysis needs of different investigators.', 'work with the core facility team to provide bioinformatics support and resources for the cluster.']
job_requirement_p: ['qualifications \xa0', 'the applicant should have the following qualifications and attributes:\xa0', 'formal application: please submit your application, supported by a detailed cv (including personal particulars, academic and employment history, complete list of publications/oral presentations and full contacts of 3 referees) to:', 'dr. kenneth ban', 'dept. of biochemistry', 'medical sciences cluster', 'yong loo lin school of medicine', 'national university of singapore', 'e-mail: bchbhkk@nus.edu.sg', '\xa0', 'only shortlisted candidates will be notified for interviews.', 'a successful candidate will be offered an appointment contract of up to 3 years and the remuneration will be commensurate with the candidate’s qualifications and experience.']
job_requirement_li: ['ph.d. in bioinformatics, computational biology, computer science or related fields', 'excellent understanding of data structures, algorithms, and scientific programming for the analysis of high-throughput biomedical data.', 'excellent software engineering skills with proficiency in unix/linux, python/r, java, c++', 'strong scientific understanding of molecular cellular biology, genetics and genomics.', 'experience with statistical analysis of high dimensional data, machine learning, high-performance computing and parallelization of workflows is highly advantageous.', 'demonstrate excellent teamwork, time management and organizational skills.', 'demonstrate outstanding personal initiative and be able to work independently in a multidisciplinary, fast-paced, dynamic and results-oriented environment.']

company_name: groupm asia pacific holdings pte. ltd.
job_description_p: ['we are\xa0looking for a\xa0head of biddable search apac\xa0to join\xa0groupm [m]platform. based in the regional singapore office, you will be responsible for leading the biddable search marketing service offering across our apac markets. this includes ensuring the consistent delivery of biddable search marketing services, implementing programmatic advertising solutions for our clients and delivering growth of new businesses. you will drive best practices in your function while ensuring integration and communication with the wider client leadership teams.', 'reporting of the role:\xa0\n \n the role will report vp services, groupm [m]platform, apac, and the vp, search global.', 'measures of success:', 'in three months:', 'in six months:', 'in 12 months:', 'responsibilities', 'requirements', 'more about [m]platform', '[m]platform is an advanced technology suite of flexible media planning applications, data analytics\xa0and\xa0digital services. the platform will improve advertisers’ ability to use audience defining insights from hundreds of data sources to find and communicate with their consumers across all media. [m]platform makes it possible for media planners at groupm agencies to use the most detailed consumer data to achieve results for their clients. it is supported by a team of data scientists, technologists and digital practitioners from across groupm specialist companies and xaxis. [m]platform unifies data analytics and digital services including search, social, mobile, digital ad operations and programmatic into one team delivering a completely open and fully transparent data and technology architecture.\xa0', 'for more information, visit\xa0https://www.groupm.com/tags/mplatform', 'about singapore', 'groupm singapore operates in one of the most dynamic and exciting environments in the world. although it is a small domestic market, there is a vibrant media industry which is undergoing rapid evolution as digital technology reshapes the way marketing supports advertisers’ needs. being at the crossroads of asia means that aside from the local clients and media owners, we also have a high proportion of multi-national clients and media owners.', 'as the largest media investment management company in singapore with over 41% market share (recma) and over 650 employees, groupm singapore is the\xa0premiere\xa0organisation\xa0to join and develop a career in.']
job_description_li: ['build solid relationships with local market search teams getting to know the business, their clients and their professional goals, and built out a management plan for the remainder of the year.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'developed a sound understanding of [m]platform’s global search product and services, as well as our broader proposition and service channels.\xa0', 'built relationships with all key stakeholders across the groupm agencies, as well as our media and technology partners.\xa0', 'reviewed the current search product roadmap, prepared an analysis of the current state of play and presented opportunities to develop our product and service offering, to deliver best in market solutions.\xa0', 'implemented operational changes to help improve the day-to-day efficiencies and deliverables from search teams, positioning the team for success.', 'undertaken a number of inter-agency initiatives that build relationships, share knowledge, develop advertiser accounts and improve operations.\xa0', 'actively managed and delivered against our growth targets.', 'built a competitive and market leading\xa0biddable\xa0proposition, which compliments the broader\xa0[m]platform\xa0proposition we extend to our clients.\xa0', 'invested in your team, offering development and learning opportunities.\xa0', 'collaborate with vp, search global on overall and evolution of the groupm [m]platform search service and delivery', 'develop the apac search strategy and work with local apac market search teams to deploy the [m]platform search offering components, and evolutions of the offering', 'conduct monthly apac market search calls with respective local market search leads. calls will be to communicate competency developments, market deployment updates, understand local market conditions and share general updates', 'assist and consult media agencies on integration of [m]platform search products and services in their operations and delivery to clients', 'build and maintain advantageous relationships with key media owners and platforms', 'contribute to strategy for search tech/platforms and services and product development in conjunction with global and local management', 'represent [m]platform through speaking engagements and publications in accordance with company and group policy (market positioning)', 'support major new business pitches', 'minimum of 8 years search marketing experience across both agency and/ or client environments', 'experience working in a heavily matrixed environment', 'excellent stakeholder management skills', 'strong leadership experience, managing teams and direct reports remotely', 'is a proven ‘game changer’. has encountered situations, seen things that others haven’t seen and then given clear direction going forward', 'excellent verbal and written skills, with ability to communicate effectively both within the network (groupm agencies) and to a range of client levels', 'commercially astute and forward thinking', 'has the ability to work independently and collaboratively as part of a [m]platform team']

job_description_p: ['at holmusk, our mission is to help solve the world’s biggest healthcare challenge - chronic disease. come join a diverse and collaborative team of engineers, designers, data scientists, health professionals and business executives that is passionate about improving healthcare.', 'our key business lines are healthcare data analytics and digital therapeutics/health programmes. as a business development director you will be involved in all aspects of the decision making process around business development – client contact, acquisition, management etc. you also get a chance to present the meaningful insights generated in projects to the different levels of healthcare stakeholders and get a chance to make a change.', 'this role involves a significant amount of time spent in uk/europe, with more time spent at our london office.\xa0', 'responsibilities']
job_description_li: ['serve as a key member of the business development team in leading the expansion of holmusk disease management platform & data analytics business in uk/europe', 'define, adapt and effectively communicate holmusk’s value proposition and key differentiating factors from the competitors in the specific market', "set a strategic business development plan for uk/europe target markets and ensure it's in line with the overall holmusk strategic direction.", 'handle a high volume of engagements and the fast pace of our company']
job_requirement_p: ['minimum', 'preferred']
job_requirement_li: ['5 to 10 years of business development experience in uk/europe, specifically in the field of healthcare and life sciences', 'experience with establishing, maintaining and leveraging c-level relationships at partner companies', 'ability to fuse business, strategy, finance and legal concepts to lead complex, multi-faceted deals', 'deep experience working with pharmaceutical, insurance and hospital systems', 'strong verbal and written communications skills are a must, as well as leadership skills.', 'demonstrated ability to work effectively across internal and external organizations.', 'business level or higher communication skills in english as must.', 'mba or jd from top university highly desired', 'prior experience in contracting, sale process for advisory engagements', 'prior experience working in healthcare or technology companies is a plus']

job_description_p: ['fueled by a fundamental belief that having access to financial services creates opportunity, paypal (nasdaq: pypl) is committed to democratizing financial services and empowering people and businesses to join and thrive in the global economy. our open digital payments platform gives paypal’s 254 million active account holders the confidence to connect and transact in new and powerful ways, whether they are online, on a mobile device, in an app, or in person. through a combination of technological innovation and strategic partnerships, paypal creates better ways to manage and move money, and offers choice and flexibility when sending payments, paying or getting paid. available in more than 200 markets around the world, the paypal platform, including braintree, venmo and xoom, enables consumers and merchants to receive money in more than 100 currencies, withdraw funds in 56 currencies and hold balances in their paypal accounts in 25 currencies.', 'job description summary:', 'senior data analytics role in global seller risk management team', 'job description:', 'responsibilities']
job_description_li: ['proven experience in credit risk analytics, along with in-depth market knowledge of credit performance, credit scoring and industry best practices', 'optimize existing risk parameters to improve accuracy on identifying risky population within paypal’s seller portfolio', 'research & develop new seller profiling and risk components to measure materiality and riskiness of sellers', 'drive and improve accuracy on criterion for selecting sellers that need a\xa0 underwriting review', 'conceptualize and implement a pipeline strategy to underwrite\xa0 sellers across the globe']
job_requirement_p: ['qualifications']
job_requirement_li: ['master/bachelor’s degree in analytics, mathematics, statistics or related quantitative discipline', '5 to 7 years experience in data analytics. risk analytics a plus', 'proficient in sql, python, java and sas', 'excel, word, and powerpoint proficiency', 'be highly curious & thoughtful, a pro-active self-starter', 'good communication skillsets']

job_description_p: ['at holmusk, our mission is to help solve the world’s biggest healthcare challenge - chronic disease. we use technology and data science to accelerate research and improve the health of people with chronic conditions. our expertise is in healthcare data analytics and digital therapeutics, which are going to be the key solution in managing the chronic disease epidemic the world is facing. our flagship digital therapeutic is glycoleap (https://glycoleap.com), a scalable, effective & engaging digital programme for people with prediabetes, diabetes and other chronic conditions. our vision is to improve the lives and health of over a million people over the next 5 years.', 'we are looking for a passionate business development manager with a strong drive to succeed and make a difference to the world. your mission is to generate sales for our digital therapeutics in singapore and the region. our typical clients include employers/large corporates, insurers and pharma. you will be involved in all aspects of the decision making process around business development – client contact, acquisition, management etc.', 'come join a diverse and collaborative team of engineers, designers, data scientists, health professionals and business executives that is passionate about improving healthcare', '\xa0', 'responsibilities']
job_description_li: ['proactively identify new business opportunities, customers and source for new clients for our digital therapeutics', 'arrange and lead meetings with potential and existing clients (employers/large corporates, insurers and pharma)', 'generation of proposals for new business, based on client needs.', 'manage the end-to-end process to drive closing of deals', 'build a strong relationship with new and existing customers and maintain a high level of customer satisfaction', 'guide and oversee execution of client projects, together with the rest of the teams.']
job_requirement_p: [None]
job_requirement_li: ['minimum 3 - 5 years of relevant working experience in a business development or sales role', 'results-oriented, with a proven track record of achieving targets.', 'experience with establishing, maintaining and leveraging relationships with senior leaders in large organisations. able to close deals independently.', 'strong verbal and written communication skills, and a passion for building new relationships', 'able to learn quickly and adapt fast in a startup environment, willing to get your hands dirty to get the tasks done', 'prior experience working in the healthcare / employee benefits / insurance industry is a strong plus']

job_description_p: ["brink's singapore is a wholly owned subsidiary of brink's, incorporated. established in 1989, we service banks and retailers and we are currently looking for a dynamic individual to join the singapore team as business process manager focusing on business processes from conception to implementation; reviewing continuous improvement; and introducing innovation that leads to impactful results.", 'the role:']
job_description_li: ['manage business process assessments using data analytics and lean management principles;', 'design cost effective solutions that enhance processes;', 'undertake implementation activities as a project manager;', 'ensure that business process outcomes are aligned with brink’s strategic goals;', 'work collaboratively across all departments of the organization to garner support from the team to improve business processes;', 'manage process change\xa0 - workflow, implementation and compliance;', 'provide timely feedback on process performance to management;', 'to enhance the overall employee engagement towards process improvement - both qualitative & quantitative.']
job_requirement_p: ['job requirements', '\xa0', 'interested candidates, please forward your resume, stating reasons for leaving present position, current salary, expected salary and availability to: kim.riar@brinksglobal.com']
job_requirement_li: ['candidate should have a recognised degree in business administration or\xa0equivalent or higher qualification;', 'at least 3 years of relevant experience in conducting organisational efficiency assessments and process design work;', 'proficient in analysing business processes using data analytics;', 'project management experience using lean methodologies and tools;', 'results oriented; tenacious, resilient, determined and a self-starter;', 'effective communication skills and good interpersonal skills;', 'innovative, creative and versatile.']

job_description_p: ['position purpose', 'the person selected for this role will be responsible for executing the improvements of services offered by the apac data & computing team. he/she will ensure that the team’s services are aligned to agreed slas and processes, and fit for customers’ changing needs and requirements.', 'this person will help ensure day-to-day operational performance remains consistently high, that operating policies are developed or are in practice, and gather customer feedback for quality assurance and improvement.', 'the candidate must possess strong organization skills, an eye for detail, have good time management, have excellent written and communication skills, be able to prioritize multiple tasks, have a background in it, and understand it procedures.', 'the successful candidate will be a member of a dynamic it team and will work with other local, regional and global it teams.\xa0', '\xa0', 'key responsibilities', '\xa0']
job_description_li: ['be client facing to the bank’s business lines, application support teams, and local it teams to take feedback and use it to make service improvements.', 'produce reports and perform data analytics on data related to service quality', 'measure, track and report key performance and risk metrics on data & computing services to various internal and external audiences.', 'support and communicate with team members across data & computing, and the larger apac it production teams', 'work closely with data & computing teams on service and process improvements', 'monitor, analyze and recommend what processes can be streamlined, made more efficient and where cost savings can be made.', 'ensure services adhere to local regulations, dr/bcp/icp requirements, meet security standards and match all global corporate standards.', 'diligently follow the bnpp operational permanent control framework and all of its rules and procedures.']

job_requirement_li: ['data analysis skillset to drive insights, make informed recommendations and develop concise and effective presentations', 'powerpoint, excel skills, power bi – including formulas, graphs and data manipulation', 'self-motivated, independent, well organized, responsible, and assertive (able to complete tasks with little supervision).', 'willing to take ownership, be hands-on and comfortable interfacing with people at all levels of the organisation.', 'possess strong negotiation and conflict resolution skills.', "possess a positive, committed and enthusiastic 'can do' attitude.", 'have a good understanding of it processes and procedures.', 'understands itil concepts and can apply them effectively.', 'minimum tertiary education level – must be a degree holder in it or equivalent subject.', 'at least 5 years’ experience preferably within a banking / financial institution environment.', 'have an itil v3 foundation qualification']

job_requirement_li: ['phd/masters/bachelors in computer science, computer engineering, statistics, applied mathematics, or related disciplines.\xa0', 'excellent understanding of software engineering principles and design patterns.', 'excellent programming skills in either python, scala, or java.', 'in-depth understanding of data science and machine learning technologies and methodologies.', 'good working knowledge of high performance computing, parallel data processing, and big data stack, e.g. spark and hadoop/yarn.', 'experience to one or more commercial / open source data warehouses or data analytics systems, e.g. teradata, is a big plus.', 'experience to one or more nosql databases is a big plus.', 'hands-on experience in cloud platforms, e.g. aws, or containerization/ virtualization platforms, e.g. docker/kubernetes, is a big plus.', 'experience to any data science or machine learning platform, e.g. ibm data science experience or cloudera data science workbench, is a big plus.', 'exposure to mainframe system is a plus.', 'passion about machine learning and data-driven intelligence system.', 'excellent communication and presentation skills in english.', 'team player, self-starter, ability to work on multiple projects in parallel is necessary.', '2+ years of experience in machine learning system or data science research', '5+ years of experience in software engineering or devops automation or data engineering', 'experience working in multi-cultural environments']

job_description_p: [None]
job_description_li: ['design and implement key components for highly scalable, distributed data collection and analysis system built for handling petabytes of data in the cloud.\xa0', 'work with architects from other divisions contributing to this analytics system and mentor team members on best practices in backend infrastructure and distributed computing topics.\xa0', 'analyze source data and data flows, working with structured and unstructured data.', 'manipulate high-volume, high-dimensionality data from varying sources to highlight patterns, anomalies, relationships and trends', 'analyze and visualize diverse sources of data, interpret results in the business context and report results clearly and concisely.', 'apply data mining, nlp, and machine learning (both supervised and unsupervised) to improve relevance and personalization algorithms.', 'work side-by-side with product managers, software engineers, and designers in designing experiments and minimum viable products.', 'build and optimize classifiers using machine learning techniques and enhance data collection procedures that is relevant for building analytic systems.', 'discover data sources, get access to them, import them, clean them up, and make them “model-ready”. you need to be willing and able to do your own etl.', 'create and refine features from the underlying data. you’ll enjoy developing just enough subject matter expertise to have an intuition about what features might make your model perform better, and then you’ll lather, rinse and repeat.', 'run regular a/b tests, gather data, perform statistical analysis, draw conclusions on the impact of your optimizations and communicate results to peers and leaders.']
job_requirement_p: [None]
job_requirement_li: ['experience in big data and machine learning', 'the ability to work with loosely defined requirements and exercise your analytical skills to clarify questions, share your approach and build/test elegant solutions in weekly sprint/release cycles.', 'development experience in java/scala and pride in producing clean, maintainable code', 'practical experience in clustering high dimensionality data using a variety of approaches', 'real world experience in solving business problems by deploying one or more machine learning techniques', 'experience creating pipelines to analyze data, extracted features and updated models in production.', 'independence and self-reliance while being a pro-active team player with excellent communication skills.', 'hands-on development with key technologies including scala, spark, and other relevant distributed computing languages, frameworks, and libraries.\xa0', 'experience with distributed databases, such as cassandra, and the key issues affecting their performance and reliability.\xa0', 'experience using high-throughput, distributed message queueing systems such as kafka.', 'familiarity with operational technologies, including docker (required), chef, puppet, zookeeper, terraform, and ansible (preferred).\xa0', 'an ability to periodically deploy systems to on-prem environments.\xa0', 'mastery of key development tools such as git, and familiarity with collaboration tools such as jira and confluence or similar tools.\xa0', 'experience with teradata sql, exadata sql, t-sql', 'strong experience in graph and stream processing', 'experience in migrating sql from traditional rdbms to spark and bigdata technologies', 'experience in building language parsers using antlr, query optimizers and automatic code generation', 'in-depth knowledge of database internals and spark sql catalyst engine']

job_requirement_li: ['7+ years professional application/frontend development experience.', 'hands on experience on at least two of the following javascript frameworks  emberjs reactjs angular (1.x or >2) backbone dojo  ', 'emberjs', 'reactjs', 'angular (1.x or >2)', 'backbone', 'dojo', 'a sound understanding of redux, webpack, styled-components, es6, jest.', 'a solid experience building applications on top of restful apis.', 'nodejs experience', 'experience in ui testing and code quality tools (jasmine, mocha, cucumber, bdd, tdd, jslint, etc...)', 'understand the paradigms and techniques associated with web page performance and degradation; how to analyze, apply measures, and resolve bottlenecks', 'demonstrable experience in object oriented javascript without the use of a library or framework  able to explain advanced concepts native to the javascript language - understanding of ecma6 standards is a big plus able to follow best coding practice with javascript. ie: avoiding global variables, namespaces, modularity, inheritance, performance, closures \xa0  ', 'able to explain advanced concepts native to the javascript language - understanding of ecma6 standards is a big plus', 'able to follow best coding practice with javascript. ie: avoiding global variables, namespaces, modularity, inheritance, performance, closures \xa0', 'solid knowledge of algorithms, design patterns, and componentization approaches.', 'experience with cross-browser, cross-platform, and design constraints on the web.', 'experience with css pre-processors (sass, less)', 'ability to operate effectively both independently and within a team environment', 'cloud experience a big plus']

job_description_p: ['delivery lead – singapore (pace analytics) ', '\xa0', 'about the role', 'we are looking for a delivery lead – singapore (pace analytics) to ensure that quality and timely products are delivered by pace analytics to the commercial organisation, and to work with the pace analytics delivery managers and project lead, consulting leaders and client leader to diagnose, scope, shape and deliver outstanding data analytics applications that solve complex business problems and impact the performance and effectiveness of business units.', 'this role is a great opportunity for a progressive and analytical professional to lead a high performing matrix team and contribute to the development of value creation opportunities within rio tinto. reporting to the senior director – pace analytics, you wil:']
job_description_li: ['great opportunity to work with a global and diverse team', 'strong visibility and engagement with the key stakeholders ', 'team leadership position ', 'based in singapore, our global commercial hub ', 'develop and maintain relationships with the key commercial customers to ensure the projects prioritized are aligned with the commercial organisation.', 'work with pace leaders as well as directly with clients and supporting teams to identify, diagnose and solve critical problems with expertise in the fields of data science and data engineering. this includes adapting pace’s products as needed to work more effectively with the client’s systems.', 'coach pace leaders and key clients on the new fields of data analytics, building a competence through the team in data, data-based decision making, analytics methodologies and problem solving approaches.', 'support the setup, establishment and ongoing improvement of pace analytics', 'maintain and deliver data analytics resources for pace initiatives, including: \t working with the client leaders to understand their business engagements and the need for advanced analytics working with consulting leaders in delivering the required technical resources to deliver decision support tools and advanced analytics to solve complex problems working with and influencing is&t and other functions to develop the technology required to support the needs of the business for analytics. understanding and resourcing the portfolio of analytics projects for commercial  ', 'working with the client leaders to understand their business engagements and the need for advanced analytics', 'working with consulting leaders in delivering the required technical resources to deliver decision support tools and advanced analytics to solve complex problems', 'working with and influencing is&t and other functions to develop the technology required to support the needs of the business for analytics.', 'understanding and resourcing the portfolio of analytics projects for commercial', 'maintain and deliver excellence in knowledge management for analytics tools development through the use of collaboration tools and industry standard project documentation approaches', 'ensure adoption of tools delivered through pace analytics, building a competence in the quality of tools as well as the ability to change internal business processes in business units globally.']
job_requirement_p: ['about you', 'to be successfully considered for this role, you will have:', '\xa0', 'it will also be beneficial if you have: ', '\xa0', 'where you will be working', 'pace consulting is a new internal management consultancy embedded within rio tinto’s growth and innovation (g&i) group. it will comprise a team of management consultants, focused on working with each part of the business on opportunities that will deliver the highest possible value. rio tinto is establishing pace to support the business in many areas where it has previously sought external management consulting expertise.', 'pace’s imperative is to support clients in identifying their top value levers through an end-to-end diagnostic; a sophisticated, quality analysis that is data-driven and uses value analytics, benchmarking and forecasting to identify key areas of focus and opportunity. between now and the end of 2017 the team working to establish pace consulting will focus on designing and creating the services, tools and methods to be used to support all parts of the business to maximise value.', '\xa0', 'about us', 'as pioneers in mining and metals, we produce materials essential to human progress.', 'our long history is filled with firsts. we’ve developed some of the world’s largest and best quality mines and operations, and our people work in around 35 countries across six continents. aluminium and copper, diamonds, gold and industrial minerals, iron ore, coal and uranium: our materials make up the world around us. you’ll find then in smartphones, planes, cars, hospitals and throughout your home.', '\xa0', 'creating an inclusive and diverse workforce', 'we are a diverse team of talented, enthusiastic individuals who foster a culture of inclusion. no matter how they may differ, our people share one thing in common. it’s a belief that work is more rewarding when we are accepted and valued for our differences, not judged by them. we all have something to contribute, and it’s this contribution that makes for a great organization and fulfilling career.', 'apply before 12th nov 2018 if you want to work with the latest technology and innovation, in an environment where we challenge you to drive positive change.', 'please note, in order to be successfully considered for a role you must complete all pre-screening questions.', '\xa0']
job_requirement_li: ['tertiary qualified in engineering, business or other relevant field', 'at least 10 years of progressive experience in moving from execution to strategic levels\xa0 \xa0', 'experience in data analytics applications delivery', 'demonstrated ability to bring together diverse range of operational and technical skills, build a high performing team and deliver outstanding results', 'demonstrated capability in building solutions to problems', 'leadership experience in managing direct and indirect project teams.', 'demonstrated experience in project management, and working through a global networked organization in achieving results.', 'effective influencing skills when engaging with senior leaders internally and externally', 'ability to multitask, prioritise and organise a number of concurrent projects under tight timeframes', 'knowledge of commercial and logistics business, specifically for commodities is an asset', 'additional qualifications in mba']

job_description_p: ['associate marketing operations analyst\xa0\n \n talend is a rapidly growing leader in the cloud, data and application integration space. we\xa0are a global company with offices in redwood city, paris, london, bonn, beijing, tokyo, singapore, sydney, and bangalore. our customers are thought leaders\xa0in\xa0data integration, cloud, and\xa0big data, and they represent\xa0some of the biggest and best\xa0names\xa0in retail, financial services, consumer products, and business services.', 'we enable data driven companies to be more effective at what they do by providing them with the tools, infrastructure, and guidance to make informed business decisions. our architecture and technology uniquely position us to take advantage of constant innovation in data and processing technologies, such as hadoop and spark. as a result, we provide the fastest, most scalable data integration platform in the industry, and we support big data natively.\xa0data, analytics, and predictable forecasts are becoming ever more important to us as our company reaches its next phase of maturity and reporting requirements.']
job_description_li: [None]
job_requirement_p: ['the marketing operations specialist, based in singapore, is part of the demand generation marketing department and directly reports to the global marketing programs manager, based in california.\n \xa0', 'this is a hands-on role which will play an integral part in building operational structure of programs in marketo, help maintain data integrity, and overall support for the demand generation marketing team. training field marketing team when necessary on marketing automation and reporting processes, systems, and working cross-functionally with our sales operations team.', '\xa0', 'the role', '\xa0', 'requirements of the role', '\xa0', 'talend is an equal opportunity employer committed to making all employment decisions on the basis of merit, capability and equality of opportunity, and without regard to race/ethnicity, gender, pregnancy, gender identity or expression, color, creed, religion, national origin, age, disability, marital status (including domestic partnerships and civil unions), sexual orientation, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other basis prohibited by federal, state or local law, or any other characteristic that has no bearing on a person’s ability to perform his or her job.']
job_requirement_li: ['develop/maintain templates in marketo to streamline the work and ensure best practices are being used', 'review and test existing marketing programs to optimize workflow and tracking', 'support the demand generation teams worldwide with any custom requirements they may have with regional programs.', 'seek out industry best practices and incorporate relevant ideas', 'work cross-functionally with the sales operations and reporting teams to ensure smooth flow of information between the teams', 'basic understanding of current online marketing concepts, strategy and best practices', '1-3 years of experience working in a b2b marketing or sales environment (preferred)', 'experience working with marketo, or other marketing automation tool a plus', 'familiarity with salesforce, or other crm', 'experience with data-input, data-cleansing and data-maintenance (preferred)', 'enthusiastic and passionate with a drive and desire to succeed', 'strongly detail-oriented with good analytical skills', 'very self-motivated as direct manager is in usa', 'open to frequent extended travel for training', 'able to work as part of the team or on own initiative', 'excellent communication and interpersonal skills with confidence in dealing with people of all levels', 'bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience']

job_requirement_li: ['design and development of energy systems for small and medium sized industries', 'development of artificial intelligence based learning algorithms for energy management', 'control/sequential decision problems in power system planning and management, energy optimization, battery management, building energy management etc. with special emphasis on deep reinforcement learning', 'establish internal/external collaborations in the area of energy systems', 'scouting of latest trends and products for energy efficiency measures', 'outstanding phd degree in electrical/ computer science engineering/physics', 'expertise in markov decision processes, deep learning (neural networks) and reinforcement learning', 'expertise in related artificial intelligence concepts like: monte carlo tree search, policy gradients, actor-critic methods, model-based acceleration', 'experience with classical control theory, model predictive control, dynamic programming', 'strong communication and presentation skills and ability to develop network with internal/external partners', 'team player and ability to work in multi-cultural environment and global simultaneous engineering teams']

job_description_p: ['mha s&t associate programme', 'the ministry of home affairs (mha) aspires to be a world-class organisation in delivering safety and security for our people. in pursuing our mission to make singapore our safe and secure best home, we remain always constant and true to our core values of honour and unity.', 'the mha science &technology (s&t) associate programme is a programme designed for stem graduates with less than 3 years of work experience who are keen to improve singapore’s safety & security.', '\xa0', 'what we offer:', 'as an s&t associate, you will specialise in domains critical to safeguarding national security such as : (a)forensics, (b) chemical, biological, radiological, nuclear and explosives (cbrne), (c)biometrics & profiling, (d)sense-making & surveillance, (e)cybersecurity, (f)data analytics & artificial intelligence and (f) robotics and automation. associates will take on challenging projects in these domains under the guidance of senior domain practitioners and lead one greenfield project to build up your portfolio.\xa0 as you work with our home team departments (e.g. spf, scdf, sps, cnb, ica, hta), you will apply science & technology expertise to address safety and security challenges for singapore.\xa0 you will also benefit from professional development opportunities including training and overseas learning trips. in addition, each s&t associate will be personally mentored by a senior management mentor.', 'to better understand the types of science & technology work undertaken by the home team, please click here.', '\xa0', 'we are looking for:', '\xa0', 'join us:\nthe application for the mha s&t associate programme is open all year round.', 'when submitting your cv and other relevant documents for the application, please also upload a separate ms word file indicating:', '\xa0']
job_description_li: ['applicants with stem disciplines/background preferred', 'applicants who have completed internships, projects or personal achievements which reflect a passion for science & technology work', 'applicants who possess skills relevant to the s&t domains', 'applicants who are technologically savvy and collaborative', 'your top 3 preferences for specialisation out of these 11 domains in rank order: (a)forensics, (b)chemical, biological, radiological, nuclear and explosives (cbrne), (c)biometrics & profiling, (d)sense-making & surveillance, (e)cybersecurity, (f)data analytics & artificial intelligence, (g) robotics & automation, (h) command, control, communications, computers & intelligence (c4i), (i)platforms, vehicles and weapons, (j) protective security and (k)human factors.', 'a short write-up of your passion for science and/or technology with specific examples of internships, projects, hackathons, other personal hobbies and tech skill-sets you possess.']

job_description_p:
['senior revenue management analyst', "zen rooms is southeast asia's fastest growing and best rated budget hospitality franchise. started in 2015, zen rooms works with more than 1000 hotels across 5 core countries offering high quality rooms at prices starting as low as usd 10. zen rooms' mission is to improve the value-for-money of the southeast asian hotel market, helping hotel franchisees be more profitable through better efficiency and higher quality.", "zen rooms has raised a total of usd 24m in funding from investors such as rocket internet, ooredoo, and korea's leading travel & hospitality company yanolja. \xa0we are on our way to be the most preferred stay option for travelers globally and are looking for exceptional individuals who are hungry to be part of this.", 'the revenue manager oversees revenue management and distribution strategy of the hotel and manage day-to-day yield operations. he/she ensures that all target market segments are developed for the long-term benefit of the property’s business, performs competitive benchmark studies and follows market trends. he/she also creates and develops pricing strategies and manages all third party distribution.
 
 he/she also provides weekly dynamic forecast of expected results, variances and budget comparisons; analyses overall monthly sales performance and provide summary report with recommendations to improve long term strategies.
 
 the revenue manager has to work closely with other departments to ensure that the pricing strategies are implemented on daily basis. he/she is responsible for assessing, analysing and pricing group business strategies. he/she needs to ensure the revenue team adopt best practice standards to include competitor analysis, environmental scanning, market modelling, distribution yield management, business mix yield management, pricing control and new pricing concepts in reports to the management.
 
 he/she also needs to evaluate performance of distribution partners and contracted rates (ota, fit, tour operators, etc.).', 'core responsibilities:', '- leading a team of 10 or more revenue management analysts across sea and reporting to the chief revenue officer on strategies regarding pricing, promotions, online distribution, customer demographics and seasonality ', '- optimising existing revenue management processes for speedy collaboration between internal teams and for maximising partner (client hotels) convenience ', '- ensuring occupancy and profitability targets are met for all flagship properties ', '- valuation of key properties and performing data analytics (working closely with bi team) to track and improve kpi performance', '- monitoring key performance metrics and taking necessary action (involving both internal and external stakeholders) promptly', '- reporting to internal and external stakeholders', '- liaising with other functional teams to ensure deliverables are on track', 'apply if this is you', '- you are analytical & hard working', '- you are proficient in at least one of the following: ms excel, python, r', '- you like to take responsibility and work under pressure & you are not looking for an easy 9 -5 job', '- you are ready to experience the pace and fast growth of an ecommerce startup', '\xa0', '\xa0', '\xa0']

job_title: svp / vp, lead data scientist, group consumer banking and big data analytics tech (180003y7)
job_description_p:
['job purpose
 the lead data scientist manages a team of data scientists within consumer banking group technology, big data & analytics technology division to drive value for the business by leveraging machine learning.
 
 he/ she will have opportunities to work on various projects that provide data-driven insights that enable enhanced capabilities in the areas of business growth, risk management, productivity etc.
 
 also, he/she will be responsible to lead a team of ml engineers that will work with data scientists to create, optimize and productionize of machine learning models for various business units within the organization. keep innovating and optimizing data and machine learning workflow to enable data-driven business activities at large scale.\xa0
 
 responsibilities']
job_description_li: ['lead, guide, and manage the team of data scientists', 'overall accountable for the team’s delivery of data science projects that drive value for business', 'establish, apply and maintain best practices and principles of machine learning engineering.', 'manage and guide a team of ml engineers that work with data scientists to build end-to-end machine learning and analytics solution to solve business challenges', 'manage and guide a team of experienced data scientists to drive projects and be accountable for the output of the team', 'partner with business stakeholders to understand needs and identify opportunities to apply data science', 'frame this opportunity as a data science problem, formulating hypotheses and techniques for experimentation', 'oversee the process of data exploration & preparation, the conduct of experiments, review of model performance, and presentation of results to business stakeholders for their feedback', 'lead the presentation of key insights to management with actionable recommendations', 'manage the team to facilitate deployment of finalised solutions to production environment', 'oversee the ongoing monitoring of model performance, and the process of model retraining if necessary']
job_requirement_p: [None]
job_requirement_li: ['at least 5 years of industry experience in data science', 'phd or advanced degree holder in computer science, machine learning, statistics, decision science, mathematics or equivalent', 'prior experience managing teams of phd-level data scientists preferred', 'excellent advanced analytics skills, with prior industry experience developing machine learning solutions for classification, prediction, forecasting and/or anomaly detection problems', 'excellent understanding of software engineering principles and design patterns.', 'excellent programming skills in either python, scala, or java.', 'in-depth understanding of data science and machine learning technologies and methodologies.', 'good working knowledge of high performance computing, parallel data processing, and big data stack, e.g. spark and hadoop/yarn.', 'highly proficient in data manipulation', 'strong expertise in at least one of the following areas (or equivalent): deep learning, nlp, graph mining, anomaly detection, large-scale recommender engines, large-scale optimizations, large-scale multivariate time-series forecasting, causal and statistical reasoning', 'ability to present analysis in a manner accessible by non-practitioners', 'good verbal and written communication skills and the ability to interact professionally with business executives', 'has a ‘can-do’ attitude', 'prior experience in banks not required but may be considered']

job_description_li: ['as a senior programmer analyst within the equity derivatives data & analytics group you will be involved in one of the most significant platform changes within the equities business. as a group, the entire division is going through an enormous growth, and within the data area, we have a huge re-architecture to undertake to move from our existing c# services to java.\xa0 the team is critical to the success of this program and has responsibility for the reference and trade data entering the risk platform as well as having joint responsibilities for the market data for equity derivatives.', 'the successful candidate will be key member of the team building out the new platform and migrating existing functionality, data validation and data between the existing and new platforms.', 'the candidate will be required to work with the front office, quants as well as counterparts in the middle office, managing requirements and work-loads across the relevant clients.', 'hands on developer who can turn requirements into a detailed design and delivering to committed timescales with suitable testing', 'build and deploy applications on linux platforms.', 'ensure citi markets and security services technology development standards are being met.']

job_title: digital tech services manager ch tech apac
job_description_p:
['as the digital technical services manager, you will lead the support and services of the various digital portfolio under the scope of the digital, data analytics and innovation (ddai) team. you will coordinate the architecture activities for the region under the guidance of the global architecture teams. you are the point of contact for all service related matters impacting ddai operations. on top of that, you are responsible for retained operations and outsourced (3rd party) services in the asia pacific (apac) region.\xa0
 
 key deliverables and responsibilities are as follow:
 
 • co-ordinates / where appropriate manages direct and indirect subordinates as well as 3rd party service partners supporting the applications and infrastructure
 • leads definition and continuous improvement of application and infrastructure processes and sub-processes effectiveness and efficiency
 • provides overall guidance for changes to the applicable service area and/or service levels that require new initiatives, projects and/or contract changes
 • oversees the capacity planning process for applicable service area working with demand forecasts from the business units and actual consumption data
 • ensures compliance with infrastructure standards for applicable service area
 • provides input and guidance for changes and continuous improvement for applicable service area
 • facilitates definition and continuous refinement of outsourced services effectiveness and efficiency measurements
 • facilitate service support trend analyses and significant problem and root-cause analyses with service provider, services and cross-services, as required
 • ensures service availability standards meet kpi targets
 • produce sla reports on monthly or when required for management review
 • reviews the sla performance with vendor and management on stipulated time-frame
 • produce service improvement plans (sip) for sla failures or process improvements
 • performs yearly review and adjust the slm baseline based with vendors and partners
 • ensure/overview audit readiness services delivery
 • lead and manage ddai services to ensure timely resolution of front-line queries.
 • drive incident investigation and analyze trends to develop actions for clear reduction in operations related concerns
 • define & implement standard process roll out model for operations to ensure end to end impact is thoroughly managed.
 • itsm practitioner with strict itsm mindset on change, incident, problem methodologies
 • role is required take a holistic view of service integration and management while primarily focusing through the lenses of operations and support.\xa0
 • capture voice of customer and prioritize service improvement proposals\xa0
 • negotiate with relevant parties in respect of event management (disruptions, adverse events, etc.) and major amendments to the provision of services. \xa0
 • ensure that gsk standard processes are applied and adhered to including embedding and adopting standard ways of working in accordance with quality risk and compliance policies.
 
 gsk’s dedication to the wellbeing of our employees is reflected in the benefits we offer; including healthcare for yourself and dependents, performance related bonus, long term incentives and a host of other flexible offerings you can tailor to your own preferences. we also offer a range of employee health and wellbeing programs including our truly unique partnership for prevention program, a global commitment by gsk to provide all employees with up to 40 preventative healthcare services bringing to life our mission to: do more, feel better and live longer.
 
 at gsk we value diversity and treat all candidates equally. we aim to create an inclusive workplace where all employees feel engaged, supportive of one another, and know their work makes an important contribution.
 
 if you would like to join us in innovating and inspiring changes in the industry, we urge you to apply.\xa0']

['• bachelor’s degree in digital, computer sciences or equivalent degrees combined with an mba or business experience
 • significant experience preferably working in large regional enterprises and managed large projects in capacity of a service delivery manager/lead - pharmaceutical/commercial/cpg or highly regulated industry.
 • experience in managing it services and application service management
 • stakeholder management with excellent verbal and written communication skills for all levels of management and staffs
 • ability to balance multiple demands and work both independently and as part of a team
 • experience with digital services delivery model
 • agile methodology
 • itil certified or strong itsm background with ability to understand and follow through all itsm best practices
 • experience in leading different resource teams in different geographies
 • background in people management, financial responsibility and business decision-making
 • has responsibility for implementing a robust set of ways or working and governance that is embedded with the team and practiced rigorously.\xa0
 • needs to have managed and conducted escalations to other teams and to senior stakeholders
 • experience in people management and demonstrated experience managing teams across functions and geographies
 • excellent leadership and teamwork skills']

company_name: groupm asia pacific holdings pte. ltd.
job_description_p:
['xaxis singapore', 'overview of job ', '
 xaxis is an agency of groupm, the world’s largest media investment company and are a part of wpp. in fact, we are responsible for one in every three ads you see globally. we are currently looking for a data science manager to join us. we are looking for a data scientist who will support our analytics, product team, sales, and marketing teams with insights gained from analysing a multitude of data sources across the programmatic advertising space. the ideal candidate is adept at using large data sets to find opportunities for campaign optimization and using models to test the effectiveness of different courses of action. they must have strong experience using a variety of data mining/data analysis methods, using a variety of data tools, building and implementing models, using/creating algorithms and creating/running simulations. they must have a proven ability to drive business results with their data-based insights. they must be comfortable working with a wide range of stakeholders and functional teams. the right candidate will have a passion for discovering solutions hidden in large data sets, working with stakeholders to improve business outcomes, and effectively communicating their ideas and solutions to the wider organisation.', 'at groupm apac, our people are our strength, which is why fostering a culture of diversity and inclusion is important to us.', 'reporting of the role', 'this role reports to: director, of marketing science apac in singapore
 
 3 best things about the job:', '\xa0', 'in this role, our manager, data science apac will take the lead in the brainstorming and development of custom bidding algorithms for key clients across apac.\xa0 you will provide guidance and direction on the ideal application of our data platforms, enabling our regional teams to leverage the data and outputs into actionable and insightful visualisations. the role of manager, data science apac will, put simply, ‘make data happen’ for xaxis – and is a key role given the growth of data-driven marketing, and the key opportunity for programmatic media in this space.\xa0 your success will lie in your capability to leverage; disparate data sets, multiple platforms, and multiple stakeholders, while delivering high quality actionable solutions to our regional and local teams.', 'in three months: ', '\xa0', '\xa0', 'in six months:', 'in 12 months:', '
what your day job looks like at xaxis:', '\xa0', 'minimum qualifications:', 'the ideal candidate will hold a bachelors or master’s degree in statistics, mathematics, business analytics, and or computer science with a minimum of 4 years’ experience, preferably in the advertising / marketing industry.\xa0 you will a need deep understanding of supervised, unsupervised, and dimension reduction machine learning techniques and be familiar with crisp-dm methodology.\xa0 you will also need to be proficient in r, python, and be able to easily extract data via api calls and from sql databases (etl).\xa0 additionally, this role will require you to have a solid understanding of statistics, and be able to conduct statistical tests.\xa0\xa0 most importantly, we are looking for someone that is a great collaborator, communicator, and team player.', '\xa0', 'other skillsets desired:', 'more about xaxis', 'xaxis is the outcome media company. it combines advanced artificial intelligence with proprietary data and proven expertise to optimize programmatic media investments and achieve improved, verifiable results for its clients. xaxis offers managed programmatic services in 47 markets including north america, europe, asia pacific, latin america, the middle east, and africa. for more information, visit www.xaxis.com', 'about singapore ', 'groupm singapore operates in one of the most dynamic and exciting environments in the world. although it is a small domestic market, there is a vibrant media industry which is undergoing rapid evolution as digital technology reshapes the way marketing supports advertisers’ needs. being at the crossroads of asia means that aside from the local clients and media owners, we also have a high proportion of multi-national clients and media owners.', 'as the largest media investment management company in singapore with over 41% market share (recma) and over 650 employees, groupm singapore is the premiere organisation to join and develop a career in.']
job_description_li: ['ability to work collaboratively with global data engineering, data science, and product teams', 'ability to experiment with new technologies / algorithms to solve business job_title: it business analyst (data acquisition & product team)
job_description_p: ['we are looking for a driven individual with a passion for data & analytics and its related business processes.\xa0', '\xa0', '\xa0']
job_description_li: ['you support the data aquisition & product team in managing the entire process of data gathering, data quality management, insights delivery and business application and get hands on experience in building data pipelines and using data visualisation and advanced analytics.', 'together with our data engineers you ensure that the incoming and processed data meets our quality standards. you help to build workflows and interfaces to maintain a top data quality which allows our internal analysts and clients to create valuable insights.', 'you support the product manager in managing the release planning for features around across all steps of the data value chain from data gathering to insights delivery, gather requirements of clients and come up with innovative ideas how to improve processes.']
job_requirement_li: ['you are passionate about data management, big data pipelines and using advanced analytics for data processing.\xa0', 'comfortable to work in a fast-growing start-up environment with an international dynamic team and a highly motivated, challenge-taking personality with a positive attitude. team-oriented with an international mindset.', 'you have some first hands-on experiences in project management, requirement gathering, technical documentation, data management, sql, data visualisation (e.g. tableau) and a good command in ms office tools like excel and powerpoint.', 'you are accurate and reliable and enjoy identiying root cause in complex environments and solving problems. you are keen to work in an international team towards great results.', 'you have a background or pursuing a degree in computer science, ideally related to data & analytics.']

job_title: it director, data & analytics plo aspac
job_description_p: ['medical devices & diagnostics global services, llc, a division of the johnson & johnson family of companies, is recruiting for a director, data & analytics. this position is in singapore and reports to the senior director, medical devices global data & analytics product line.\xa0', 'caring for the world, one person at a time has inspired and united the people of johnson & johnson for over 125 years. we embrace research and science -- bringing innovative ideas, products and services to advance the health and well-being of people. employees of the johnson & johnson family of companies work with partners in health care to touch the lives of over a billion people every day, throughout the world.', 'the company is seeking a leader responsible for the vision of data and analytics strategy and own implementation of roadmap across commercial medical devices aspac. he / she will create impactful and intuitive data and analytics products, finding solutions to challenging and complex business problems.', 'product line owner - it director will be responsible for\xa0']
job_description_li: ['successfully deliver to aspac customers managing their expectations, making quick decisions and delivering solutions at the forefront of technology within the ever-changing data landscape.', 'align stakeholders and development teams around common measurable product goals, and continue to entice and engage business into the product development process.', 'think creatively about increasing effectiveness of the data & analytics product line, embedding agile practices into the organization.', 'maintain a strong view of external capabilities in the market and their ability to drive business value.', 'closely partner with enterprise architects in continually scans technology landscape and keeps abreast of latest product offerings and potential impact to j&j.', 'form and maintain strong internal partnerships across all it functions, ensuring strong alignment to our it model.', 'develop and articulate product line vision, goals and business value.', 'prioritize and aligns with business and it stakeholders.', 'deliver product demonstrations and presentations to internal customers.', 'manage project plans, timescales and budgets.', 'work with external third parties to assess partnerships and licensing', 'incorporate agile experience in navigating the sdlc.', 'craft a product backlog that articulates all aspects of the user requirements and define well-formed acceptance criteria.']
job_requirement_p: [None]
job_requirement_li: ['a minimum of a bachelor’s degree is required; a degree in the field of computer science or business administration is preferred.\xa0', 'a master’s degree in computer science or business administration and/or master of business administration with technology as a core component is also preferred.', 'a minimum of 10 years of relevant experience managing and\xa0 directing large it projects is required', 'experience in the healthcare industry with strong commercial business acumen required.\xa0', 'experience with commercial operations business processes required.\xa0', 'knowledge of strategic customer group, global business intelligence, marketing, crm, global education services preferred.\xa0', 'experience with medical devices datasets (erp, sfe, sales compensation, product life cycle management, 3rd party data etc) is required.', 'deep knowledge of data governance, data integration, data quality, master data and metadata management capabilities required.\xa0', 'experience as both a team member and coach in the agile product owner/scrum master roles is required.', 'an understanding of business and ability to relate priorities to associated technology investments, experience effectively collaborating and managing global stakeholders is required.', 'knowledge of trends (e.g., big data, cloud computing) and expertise driving adoption to improve it, knowledge of technical engineering best practices, experience with running and teaching agile, and domain expertise are all required.', 'deep knowledge of aws big data eco system (s3, redshift, emr etc) is required.\xa0', 'the ability to synthesize leadership and stakeholder inputs into product decisions for team and the ability to pick up technical and business concepts quickly and proactively create and communicate deep industry and business insights are required.', 'deep knowledge of technologies, their application, sustainability, scalability relative to data & analytics is required.\xa0', 'excellent understanding of product planning and execution, knowledge of healthcare, business theory, processes, management, and budgeting and business office operations is required.', 'lean requirements gathering and story mapping experience is preferred.', 'people management experience is required.', 'up to 10% travel is required']
