job_description_p: ['who we are', "capital match (www.capital-match.com) is the largest marketplace invoice financing platform in southeast asia based in singapore. we are an innovative fintech business with a range of financial solutions to smes and investors. we have funded more than us$80 million in singapore over the past 3 years. we are funded by multiple vcs and institutional investors including dymon asia capital, an alternative asset manager with $6bn aum and eduardo saverin's b capital group.", 'the role', 'capital match is looking for a lead data scientist who will bring impact to every stage of our work flow including customer acquisition, operational automation, risk and underwriting, portfolio servicing, marketing and product development.\xa0we are looking for a top performer to join our team in singapore and build a leading fintech business in southeast asia.', 'the lead data scientist will be working with functional teams in every major area (sales, credit, tech, and product) and this would be a cross-functional role improving decision making processes and outcomes across the company.', 'our platform', 'our platform is primarily developed in haskell with a clojurescript frontend. we use docker containers, nix and standard cloud infrastructure systems to manage our production rollouts. we use continuous testing, integration and deployment wherever possible.', 'responsibilities']
job_description_li: ['utilize big data and machine learning to build predictive models including but not limited to customer acquisition, credit risk, fraud, marketing, etc.', 'evaluate available data sources and propose strategic acquisition or creation of new data sources to assist ongoing problem resolution. \xa0', 'work with multiple, complex data sources (financial, psychometric and transactional\xa0etc.) at large scale.', 'perform thorough testing and validation of models and support various aspects of the business with data analytics.', 'identify new data sources/patterns that add significant lift to predictive modelling capabilities.']
job_requirement_p: ['qualifications', 'what we offer']
job_requirement_li: ['minimum 3-5 years of coding, machine learning and large-scale data analysis experience.', 'past experience in credit risk technology and providing solutions for financial institutions would be highly valuable.', 'background in fintech, credit risk and/or especially lending/invoice financing space would be a great advantage.', 'minimum exposure to and understanding of xp practices (tdd, ci, emergent design, refactoring, peer review and programming, continuous improvement) is expected.', 'familiarity with linux systems and command-line environment would be helpful to perform well in this role.', 'an individual who is eager to use data to come up with new ideas to improve decisions, who is driven by making impact through actionable insights and improvements, and who is not afraid to take risks and try new things.', 'willing to be based in singapore.', 'salary of sgd 5,000-10,000/month (depending on experience and qualifications).', 'equity options for outstanding candidates.']

job_description_p: ['the two project officers will join an expanding research group that works on security and privacy issues in data analytics and networked systems. under the guidance of dr. jun zhao (assistant professor in the school of computer science and engineering at ntu), the first project officer will work the first problem below, and the second project officer will work the second problem below:']
job_description_li: ['building privacy-preserving, attack-resilient machine learning and data analytics,\xa0 \t in problem 1 above, the first project officer will incorporate differential privacy and defend against adversarial examples in deep learning. apple and google have lately implemented differential privacy in their data analysis procedures. deep learning was recently shown to be vulnerable to adversarial inputs, which are maliciously crafted samples to trigger misbehavior of the systems.  ', 'in problem 1 above, the first project officer will incorporate differential privacy and defend against adversarial examples in deep learning. apple and google have lately implemented differential privacy in their data analysis procedures. deep learning was recently shown to be vulnerable to adversarial inputs, which are maliciously crafted samples to trigger misbehavior of the systems.', 'addressing security in the internet of things (iot) and cyber-physical systems. \t in problem 2 above, the second project officer will address the unique challenges in iot security resulting from the heterogeneity among devices and service providers, and the massive-scale, geographically distributed data in iot applications.\xa0  ', 'in problem 2 above, the second project officer will address the unique challenges in iot security resulting from the heterogeneity among devices and service providers, and the massive-scale, geographically distributed data in iot applications.\xa0']

job_title: analyst / senior analyst (digital workplace programme office)
job_description_p: ['you will work closely with the smart nation & digital government office and govtech to build the vision articulated in the digital government blueprint of a digitally-confident public service workforce that is supported by a digitally-enabled workplace and digital tools.', 'your primary work scope will be driving the efforts to build digital capabilities. the top priority currently is digital literacy, the effort to equip all 145,000 public officers with the basic skills to function effectively in a digitally-enabled workplace. you will work closely with the civil service college and govtech to drive strategy and implementation for digital literacy training across the public service. other major initiatives are digital skills for leaders and the redesign of public officers’ job requirements to include new digital skills such as data analytics.', 'you may also work on projects related to improving the employee digital experience for public officers together with our partners in govtech and the smart nation & digital government office. the team undertakes user research and drives adoption for new digital tools used within the public service. examples of these tools include a knowledge management system, work flow system, and a mobile app for employee transactions such as leave and claims.', 'requirements', '\xa0', 'only shortlisted applicants will be notified within two weeks of the closing date.\nsuccessful candidates will be offered a 2-year contract in the first instance.']

job_description_p:
['about standard chartered', "we are a leading international bank focused on helping people and companies prosper across asia, africa and the middle east.\xa0
 to us, good performance is about much more than turning a profit. \xa0it's about showing how you embody our valued behaviours - do the right thing, better together and never settle - as well as our brand promise, here for good.
 we're committed to promoting equality in the workplace and creating an inclusive and flexible culture - one where everyone can realise their full potential and make a positive contribution to our organisation. this in turn helps us to provide better support to our broad client base.", 'the role responsibilities', "technology power’s standard chartered bank's vision and strategic agenda through the provision of \xa0 \xa0innovative and efficient technology solutions; we deliver greater value to our business stakeholders; we improve the skills and flexibility of our people and work more effectively with our internal and vendor service partners. \xa0
 the cloud infrastructure services function is responsible for the delivery of all cloud solutions across the standard chartered bank group. cloud infrastructure platforms is responsible for the design, engineering and support of private cloud and public cloud platforms. within cloud infrastructure platforms there are five teams namely public cloud, private cloud, cloud operations, platform on-boarding, and risk. the global team consists of approximately 40 highly skilled team members located in the singapore, malaysia, india, and the uk.
 there is a requirement for a senior level database cloud engineer who will be responsible for evaluating, designing, and implementing complete infrastructure solutions from the ground up. you'll be working within a global team on innovative hardware, operating systems, hypervisors, containers, databases, software defined networks and software defined storage to build out our next generation cloud computing solutions. this is a hands-on role with an emphasis on cloud database offerings ensuring fully automated integration into the banks ecosystem whilst at the same time ensuring that the database offering meets customer requirements and is fully engineered and available for both private and public cloud. we are looking for a result oriented, self-starter who will be able to dive deep into problems and think outside of the box to create production ready solutions.", 'key roles & responsibilities', '1. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 run platform across global regions and ensure consistency in our use of cloud services.', '2. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 evaluate and propose new technologies for business solutions.', '3. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 interact with customers to understand business requirements and expectations.', '4. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 establish best engineering practices through solid design decisions, processes, and tools.', '5. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 technical product qualification (benchmarking, suitability, performance characteristics) of relevant \xa0 \xa0hardware and software for use case requirements.', '6. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 write server side code to create robust production offerings that are highly available, scalable and can cope with burst demand.', '7. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 champion agile best-practices, processes, and tools in support of devops processes.', '8. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 ensure proactive capacity planning and expansions.', 'special responsibilities-', '1. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 ensuring that standard chartered own images in the cloud environments are fully consistent with bank audit and compliance requirements and fully consistent with the design ethos and technical requirements of external and internal cloud providers.', '2. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 ensuring that all relevant platforms are being efficiently and appropriately supported in scb ci/cd toolchains, including identifying opportunities for toolchain and operational practise improvements.', '3. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 cloud platform estate management including license / support subscription oversight, control and best utilization, automation of estate reporting and management, including close collaboration with other platforms.', '4. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 supporting adoption of containers and container control frameworks for external and internal cloud services, including container platform selection and design, cost and license planning and ensuring that self-service design/deployment/control web containers is appropriate for requirements.', '5. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 incident management for issues related to private cloud services, acting as senior escalation point for cloud support, driving service restoration and stability during significant incidents.', 'governance', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 take personal responsibility for understanding the risk and compliance requirements of the role.', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 understand and comply with, in letter and spirit, all applicable laws and regulations, including those governing anti-money laundering, terrorist financing and sanctions; the group’s policies and procedures; and the group code of conduct.', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 effectively and collaboratively identify, escalate, mitigate and resolve risk and compliance matters.', 'technology competencies\xa0', '1. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 required - expertise with oracle, ms-sql, mysql, mariadb, aws rds/aurora', '2. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 required - expertise with mongodb, cassandra db, redis or other nosql/in memory databases', '3. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 required – experience of building database offerings on openstack iaas platforms.', '4. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 required - deep expertise software defined compute, storage, networks (sddc).', '5. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 strongly advantageous - experience of deploying and controlling virtual machines in a cloud services environment, preferably with amazon web services or other cloud providers such as microsoft azure or google cloud platform.', '6. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 required - experience and expertise in continuous integration / continuous deployment practise, tooling and techniques (jira, confluence, bitbucket, git; jenkins, artifactory, terraform, packer, rundeck, ansible, appdynamics)', '7. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 required – experience with at least one of data analytics tools such as splunk and/or elk.', '8. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 required - ability to write code. ideally in python or java.', '9. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 strongly advantageous - experience and demonstrable accomplishments as a devops or automation engineer.', '10. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 strongly advantageous – experience of successful and demonstrable achievements in collaborative working with compliance, technology risk and regulatory requirement specialists.', '11. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 advantageous - extensive experience and demonstrable accomplishments in selecting, designing and implementing automation and compliance frameworks that are applied to virtual compute resource deployments in the cloud.', '12. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 advantageous - deep experience in multi-tier application architecture, development, deployment and support.', '13. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 advantageous - knowledge of writing code to produce and consume restful api’s.', 'service and finance', '1. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 demonstrates delivering services as a business (understanding and analysing the cost base of a service, controlling a recharge and recovery model)', '2. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 vendor interaction, understand the product/technology lifecycle (end-of-life) and provide recommendation for changes/upgrades.', '3. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 demonstrates tactical ownership for the management and support of assigned infrastructure areas.', '4. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 participating in initiatives to maintain a secure, consistent, and effective global technical infrastructure service.', 'personal and inter-personal skills', '1. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 delivers by possessing productivity, professionalism, customer service attitude, attention to detail and quality; ability to multitask; strong interpersonal skills, strong verbal and written communication skills and adherence to standard operating procedures.', '2. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 demonstrates ability to adapt to a rapidly changing environment and ability to take direction from multiple areas.', '3. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 comfortable in an agile and fast-moving environment.', '4. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 developing self & others through coaching, contributing to team, continuously learning and sharing knowledge.']

skills: ['recruiting', 'executive search', 'technical recruiting', 'sourcing', 'talent acquisition', 'human resources', 'interviews', 'contract recruitment', 'recruitment advertising', 'management', 'talent management', 'hr consulting', 'permanent placement', 'screening resumes', 'business development', 'employer branding', 'training', 'performance management', 'graduate recruitment', 'negotiation']
job_description_p: ['we’re looking for an experienced talent management consultant/psychologist, with demonstrated project management experience and a passion in talent management solutions to join our successful and growing singapore team. given our recent strategic wins on a number of large-scale projects, the position offers an opportunity for an experienced consultant/ psychologist to lead and deliver major projects in the areas of assessment and leadership development, whilst guiding the development and growth of the team.', 'the company', 'hudson talent management offers leading practice solutions that are underpinned by psychology and data analytics. we deliver innovative, competitive and industry-leading solutions for our clients, supporting them to:', 'the role', 'as a member of our team, you’ll be joining a group of highly ambitious consultants/ psychologists that take their work seriously, but not themselves. we strive toward team based targets which fosters a collaborative, transparent and growth oriented culture. you will thrive in environment that is:', "our apac business is growing with big plans for the future which means there are exciting career opportunities for you. you'll join a winning management team with 50+ years of collective experience across regions, practices and industries.", 'benefits', 'team bonuses and our star awards program that recognises and rewards great work.over the last year our employees received nearly 300 hours of training delivered by our apac learning & development team.', 'you may apply directly to this job advertisement, else you may reach out to stephen tan at stephen.tan@hudson.com with your updated resume.\xa0']
job_description_li: ['hire with confidence: by developing profiles for specific roles, and assessing fit against key capabilities', 'grow great leaders: by identifying leadership potential, and developing leadership capability', 'engage through change: by providing expertise on the people impact of organisational change, and transitioning people to new career pathways', 'one of the most highly regarded brands in the talent management sector', 'agile and adaptable systems and solutions, supported by a global research & development team', 'a collaborative, high performance culture and a defined career pathway', 'a great balance of respect, autonomy and guidance from our leaders']
job_requirement_p: ['you are passionate about delivering high quality solutions for our clients through your consulting and relationship management skills; you are full of initiative and get excited about learning new things everyday; you are committed to showcasing value to our clients and want to build long-lasting partnerships.', 'skills & competence']
job_requirement_li: ['taking a lead role in building, nurturing and sustaining strong business partnerships with existing and new clients', 'initiating contact with clients and developing client relationships, with a view to create business opportunities', 'providing innovative, effective solutions to clients', 'applying strong commercial acumen, conveying knowledge and providing rigorous consultation to clients', 'conducting assessment centres/ development centres, and completing participant reports', 'delivering developmental feedback to senior executives after completion of a psychometric profiling tool, 360-feedback survey, or assessment centres/ development centres', 'managing change and career transition programmes', 'managing executive coaching programmes', 'project management, including preparation of client proposals, costing and ongoing account management', 'exposure to the talent management lifecycle of selection, development, leadership, change and career transition.', 'masters qualification in psychology/ organisational behaviour/ organisational development/ human resources would be preferred.']

job_description_li: ['negotiate, track & measure all appropriate service levels for all services provided and ensure compliance to critical processes.\xa0', 'define and document operational requirements, goals and objectives to ensure business metrics are met.', 'develop processes and tools to meet/exceed performance metrics.', 'evaluate on-going costs for operational resources & processes and determine new efficiency opportunities', 'ensure the services are consistently improving overall quality, speed of delivery of services and business value to the j&j operating companies.', 'have an unrelenting focus on reducing total cost of ownership (tco) across j&j through the instantiation of lean methodology and a culture of continuous improvement through quantifiable programs & processes', 'deliver end-to-end application development, testing, maintenance, break/fix and support, for all aspac regional demand in line with the requirements as identified by the opcos and regional leadership.', 'key responsibilities will be focused on managing development & support for one or more of data & analytics, commercial & digital, supply chain & crm delivery services within aspac region', 'design, deploy, measure and continuously improve, a robust suite of processes', 'drive down unit cost both in development and support portfolio by leveraging activity based costing (abc) combined with lean methodology and continuous process improvement framework.\xa0', 'responsible for knowledge retention and standardization of development and support processes and practices across all aspac delivery service lines.', 'work with resource management team to ensure adequate capacity & capability to be able to fulfill the demand.', 'work with delivery, operations and vendor organization to ensure the capacity is fully allocated and utilized efficiently.', 'work with delivery, operations and vendor organization teams to drive continuous improvements to the cost of delivery and performance metrics.', 'conduct regular business reviews (at least on a quarterly basis) with the stakeholders to review performance; identify / monitor to closure of all key open action items resulting from the reviews', 'provide regular and detailed appropriate reports back to stakeholders and at all levels of management and staff about the current status of services, vendor performance, and industry trends.', 'act as first level escalation point for the delivery issues and be available as engagement point of contact for it partners within the aspac region']

job_title: it manager, logistics transportation and data analytics services, product line owner, aspac
job_description_p: ['supply chain bt product line organizations (plos) are responsible for the product line technological direction across segments and serve as a critical point of contact for business and technology. individuals in a product line will work with btls, senior technology and business leaders to identify and prioritize solutions for their product line and oversee the consistent implementation of these services/solutions across the business.\xa0 they will exhibit strong influence and passion for driving the organization towards consistent technology solutions aligned to an overall technology strategy.\xa0 plo will need to continuously maximize throughput of the various product lines and products and ensure that value is realized by the business through the technology capabilities implemented. plos/pos are responsible to continuously drive efficiencies and effectiveness in their product areas.\xa0 pl members should have a strong view of external technology capabilities in the marketplace and how they can be applied to drive business value for j&j.', 'this role is accountable for regional transportation management systems (tms) and data analytics supporting customer logistics services (cls) in the region.\xa0 this role has accountability for the alignment with the global technology strategy, and for the reliability, and performance of tms solutions. this role is responsible as the po for tms in aspac. this role will manage j&j’s transportation services requirements within the region. the responsibility includes transporting from j&j to j&j locations (inbound transportation) as well as the delivery of j&j products to our end customers (outbound transportation) across ~110 dcs regionally.\xa0\xa0', 'this role also makes sure that tms are continuously optimized to drive operational efficiencies across cls.\xa0 this role works closely with other logistics pl areas, btls, and sc integrated solutions & services (is&s).\xa0 the po will ensure proper technology lifecycle management, tech burden reduction, risk remediation, and cybersecurity readiness for the tms.\xa0', '\xa0', 'approximate percentage of time - tasks/duties/responsibilities\xa0']
job_description_li: ['technology strategist: who spans multiple internal and external (3pl) transportation technologies/services strategy to enable/enhance/drive j&j products distribution strategy.', 'technical depth: technical scope of knowledge includes tms/etc., applications supporting transportation management processes globally.', 'product leader: partnering with the business to define the product strategy and roadmap; balances innovation and delivery; anticipates future needs and proactively improves product features; ensures products meet service level expectations (i.e., reliability and performance)', 'investment manager: partners with business to define new functionality investment priorities and technology lifecycle management investments, accountable for all financials the product area (including: capex, opex, business value realization, and manages portfolio of investments)', 'business transformation leader: partners with the business to drive business process optimization/leaning and mapping; drives business partners towards standard solutions.\xa0', 'program and service manager: tracks progress of product development and deployment. reports back to the business and btls on status on the delivery of features, functionality, and applications; has global accountability. ensures high reliability and up-time of the products in operation. works with technology services to continually improve the service levels and reliability.', 'talent leader: a leader and developer of talent; coach and mentor individuals to excel in product management; passionately owns and is a role model for diversity & inclusion', 'this position is responsible for coordinating and executing the it delivery of transportation services in aspac for the sct global transportation services product line.', 'this leader will partner with the aspac business transportation services product owner to drive end-state strategy, level set expectations, features and manage business process requirements.', 'the incumbent will also partner and collaborate with the global team members in sct transportation services as well as enterprise jjt groups and related business functions to identify and manage interdependencies between the teams, to ensure workstream delivery per plan within the region, and to manage updates to senior leadership.', 'the role requires active engagement and strong partnering skills with the aspac and ww transportation team, as in particular with our jj technology services teams to ensure the successful delivery of the aspac transportation programs.', 'the incumbent will have responsibilities for both inbound and outbound technologies supporting the transportation services and associated integrations with related applications.\xa0', 'the candidate will require deep understanding of the sdlc / agile development methodologies and jj ts engagement processes, along with a good track record demonstrating strong execution and delivery skills.', '30% -\xa0partner with business process owners, btls, other sc-bt plos, enterprise architecture, ts infrastructure services, ts application services and enterprise programs leadership teams to drive alignment on goals, objectives and delivery of innovative and creative commitment.\xa0\xa0', '20% - develops and articulates the vision, strategy, roadmap and business value. prioritizes and aligns backlog of features with business and technology stakeholders towards a regular release schedule. manages the overall product roadmap – including introduction and decommissioning of the products', '20% - develop and deliver tms capability offerings and new technologies to drive business value', '20% - accountable for product life cycle management including total cost of ownership optimization of the product line; program/project financial targets and the implementation, measurement and continuous improvement of technology programs and operations to improve throughput and quality at lower cost', '5% - support the organizational and people development activities of internal and external associates through coaching and mentoring activities and continuous updating organization skills/knowledge profile.', '5% - continuously learn via research, technology vendors, it architecture and tech. events to get ahead of the curve and proactively being new relevant capabilities to the product line']

skills: ['project management', 'windows server', 'sql', 'linux', 'active directory', 'troubleshooting', 'virtualization', 'java', 'vmware', 'itil', 'integration', 'servers', 'system administration', 'management', 'security', 'windows', 'software development', 'it service management', 'it management', 'cloud computing']
job_description_p: ['cloud adoption isn’t just about the migration. from business strategy to process design, from infrastructure management to training and support; cloud comrade has all it takes to make the move to cloud swift, smooth and secure.', 'to help our customers getting the most out of the cloud we are looking for new members to our team which are willing to learn, able to help and have the mindset of an entrepreneur.', 'please read on if you can tick at least 5 of these topics:', 'the preferred candidate has experience in a wide variety of technologies and tools. that does not necessarily mean he/she is proficient in cloud yet. but you need the will to learn fast and constantly. you should not be afraid, just because a tool is new to you. the role requires to understand the cloud technology but also the needs of the business.', 'naturally we need experience with different systems and it operations, like configuring linux, administrating windows, changing firewall rules. it will be a big plus, if you already have a cloud certification. even better if you are a go-to resource in networking, security, and/or databases.\xa0', 'your job will be to setup, manage, and maintain servers and infrastructure on the cloud; incl. storage and network, as well as os, web servers and databases. you will evaluate and recommend the best solution for our customers, while observing all aspects of security, functionality, risk and cost.', 'customers need you to actively support their migration to the cloud, moving data and workloads without affecting their daily operations, sometimes after-hours. you need to keep your contacts update along the way and provide comprehensive documentation of work progress and results.', 'we like you to collaborate efficiently and communicate openly with everyone. in other words, we want you to be our comrade! inside and outside of regular office hours.', 'the role will bring you in contact with a diverse set of customers of all sizes and industries; mainly in singapore but also in the region.', 'if you think this job is for you, you are allowed to work either in singapore, malaysia, or indonesia and you are available, please apply.', 'follow us on our company linkedin page by going to: https://www.linkedin.com/company/cloud-comrade\xa0']

', ' customers need you to actively support their migration to the cloud, moving data and workloads without affecting their daily operations, sometimes after-hours. you need to keep your contacts update along the way and provide comprehensive documentation of work progress and results. job_description_p: ['about the institute for infocomm research (i²r)', 'the institute for infocomm research (i²r) is a member of the agency for science, technology and research (a*star) family and is singapore’s largest ict research institute. our strategic thrusts are in the spheres of intelligence, communications and media and our research capabilities are in shared sensor networks, public-public/public-private data-sharing platform, big data analytics and visualization solutions. for more information about i2r, please visit www.i2r.a-star.edu.sg', 'the department of image and video analysis is seeking a talented scientist to join a multi-disciplinary team in the development of a novel visual inspection system for modern aircraft. specifically, this project is exploring ways to automate the aircraft inspection process for improved efficiency and safety; and will include a robotic component to navigate and scan the aircraft surface. ', 'this job provides an excellent opportunity to explore new computer vision algorithms and collaborate with external partners on practical real-world problems.\xa0the use of computer vision is paramount\xa0to this project, with the opportunity to investigate advanced computational methods in an exciting domain area. you will be working among software and robotic engineers, machine learning and human-computer interaction experts.', 'roles:']
job_description_li: ['explore prototype techniques for object detection and recognition of aircraft defects', 'develop and implement novel computer vision algorithms ', 'support the integration of vision algorithms in application development ', 'support performance testing and benchmarking']
job_requirement_p: ['the above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. a*star may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. these policies may be amended from time to time without notice. we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.']
job_requirement_li: ['bachelor\xa0or master\xa0in computer science, electrical engineering, or related field', 'minimum 1 year of industrial experience', 'strong analytical and interpersonal communication skills', 'good knowledge in computer vision, machine learning and image processing', 'experience with opencv', 'experience with programming languages such as c# or c++', 'familiarity with gpu computing an advantage ', 'awareness of good scientific practices', 'strong analytical and interpersonal communication skills', 'motivated and resourceful individual']

job_description_p: ['about invigor', 'at invigor we’re a leading data analytics, insights and loyalty company and our mission is to provide a world-class platform to the retail sector, giving them access to the latest marketing technologies so they can effectively engage with their customers while increasing loyalty.', 'our difference is that we focus on business outcomes. we take a strategic view to deliver our clients profitable growth. our interconnected data sets allow better understanding of markets, competitors and consumers through affordable cloud-based solutions.', 'invigor’s solutions offers insights into market activity such as competitor pricing and consumer behaviour as well as allowing engagement with consumers through relevant content and digital real estate. our technology and innovation can be seen in one of sydney’s historic ferry terminals, manly wharf, where a high traffic transport hub has been transformed into a digital precinct and a number of clients in singapore and across south east asia.\xa0', '\xa0', 'overview', 'we are looking for a talented\xa0and\xa0experienced\xa0devops engineer to help us to support our growing business and join our technology team, focused on delivering\xa0a\xa0high quality family\xa0of\xa0products.', 'we pay special attention to those that are looking to create new and innovative ideas, not just reinvent the old.', '\xa0', 'essential duties and responsibilities']
job_description_li: ['collaborate with software engineers to analyze and enhance current workflow by instituting devops practices', 'build infrastructure that requires minimum operational maintenance', 'streamline traditional sysadmin tasks via automation (e.g. server provisioning, code deployments, etc.)', 'introduce and maintain development toolchains that can improve productivity of the technology team (e.g. tools for continuous integration/deployment, monitoring tools, etc.)', 'make sure that the infrastructure is highly scalable, secured and fault-tolerant']
job_requirement_p: ['who we are looking for']
job_requirement_li: ['minimum of two years working experience as devops engineer', 'expertise in automation/configuration management using any of ansible, puppet chef, terraform and/or kubernetes', 'expertise in aws cloud solutions', 'experience with designing and building an entire infrastructure from scratch', 'experience with container-based technologies (e.g. docker, coreos, etc)', 'strong background in linux/unix administration', 'experience with managing data storage/caching solutions (e.g. mysql, mongodb, redis, memcache)']

job_description_p: ['product development intern: part-time', 'invigor is a leading data analytics, insights and loyalty engagement company. we provide a technological platform to the retail sector, giving them access to the latest marketing technologies so they can effectively engage with their customers while increasing loyalty.', 'start date: immediate', '\xa0note: candidates must be already based in singapore.', 'are you interested in technology and entrepreneurship? do you have a passion for innovation and product development? are you a self-starter with a “can do” attitude keen to get some hands-on experience? are you currently studying or recently graduated with a bachelor’s degree?', 'then you are eligible to apply for an internship at invigor group, which may lead to a full-time position for the right candidate!', 'key responsibilities:', '\xa0', '- \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0work collaboratively with engineering and product teams to write test case scenarios and ensure the quality of products released.', '- \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0product testing:', 'o \xa0 record and document test results versus expected behaviour.', 'o \xa0 detect software failures so that defects may be discovered and corrected.', 'o \xa0 provide recommendations, where applicable, on product improvements.', '\xa0']

job_requirement_p: ['bout you:', 'you are passionate about all things mobile and product development-related. you love diving under the hood of consumer data to work out what makes us all do what we do. you thrive in start-ups and small team environments where the only thing holding you back is…well… you.', 'we’re looking for an individual who has demonstrated initiative, analytical skills and who is not afraid to roll up their sleeves and get on with it. flexibility and follow-through is key in our fast-paced environment.', "this position requires you to work collaboratively with invigor's product management and engineering teams to complete product testing and ensure the quality of our solutions before they are launched to market. your analysis and recommendations will serve as important insights for clients, internal management and product decisions within the team.", 'candidate requirements:', '- \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0currently studying or recent graduate at bachelor level or higher (technology, engineering or business majors preferred but other majors are welcome).', '- \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0attention to detail.', '- \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0strong analytical thinking skills.', '- \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0self-starter with the ability to work relatively autonomously.', '- \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0enthusiastic team player.', '- \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0an interest/affinity with mobile applications and online shopping.', '\xa0']

job_description_p: ['about invigor', 'at invigor we’re a leading data analytics, insights and loyalty company and our mission is to provide a world-class platform to the retail sector, giving them access to the latest marketing technologies so they can effectively engage with their customers while increasing loyalty.', 'our difference is that we focus on business outcomes. we take a strategic view to deliver our clients profitable growth. our interconnected data sets allow better understanding of markets, competitors and consumers through affordable cloud-based solutions.', 'invigor’s solutions offers insights into market activity such as competitor pricing and consumer behaviour as well as allowing engagement with consumers through relevant content and digital real estate. our technology and innovation can be seen in one of sydney’s historic ferry terminals, manly wharf, where a high traffic transport hub has been transformed into a digital precinct and a number of clients in singapore and across south east asia.\xa0', '\xa0', 'overview', 'we are looking for a talented\xa0and\xa0experienced\xa0 senior software engineer to help us to support our growing business and join our technology team, focused on delivering\xa0a\xa0high quality family\xa0of\xa0products.', 'we pay special attention to those that are looking to create new and innovative ideas, not just reinvent the old.', '\xa0', 'essential duties and responsibilities']
job_description_li: ['work closely with the technical lead to design, validate and implement application solutions', 'translate product specifications, designs and wireframes into high functioning code', 'produce detailed technical specifications and documentation\xa0', 'provide solutions which support a platform architecture that considers scalability, reliability, automation and customer experience requirements.', 'work on bug fixes, enhancements and constantly seek ways to improve the invigor tech stack.', 'work effectively with internal development team and development partners which may include off-shore teams.']
job_requirement_p: ['who we are looking for', '\xa0', 'nice to have', '\xa0']
job_requirement_li: ['degree holder of bs/ms in computer science or equivalent with full stack web development skills', '6 to 10 years of relevant working experience in designing and/or building web solutions/applications', 'experience with development frameworks, programming or scripting languages, with some or all of the following: php, laravel, javascript, nodejs, react, vuejs, python', 'proficient in caching and databases/data storage solutions: mysql, memcached, redis, nosql', 'experience with cloud-based development in aws and/or azure', 'experience with scalability and high availability design.\xa0', 'ability to work in a core platform team environment with aggressive deadlines and multiple priorities.', 'skills and experience\xa0in unix administration, shell scripting, git, amazon web services or azure.', 'good to have working knowledge of emerging platform architectures around serverless concept.\xa0', 'excellent analytical and design skills at product level.', 'experience with agile software development processes', 'experience with large-scale and distributed software systems']

job_title: senior assoc, audit digitalization business analyst – data analytics & robotics team, grp audit(1800
job_description_p: ['business function\xa0', 'group audit helps the board and executive management meet the strategic and operational objectives of the dbs group. we conduct independent checks to ensure that the group’s risk and control processes are adequate and effective. all our team members are highly sought-after professionals who work as trusted advisors to our clients, in all matters related to a company’s internal controls.\xa0', 'this position supports the digitalisation efforts of the ibg audit team.\xa0 as such, it requires strong knowledge of ibg, gts and rmg related systems, data and processes.', 'the candidate will be a major enabler of audit digitalisation, understanding auditor requirements and providing digital tools to transform the way audits are carried out.\xa0', 'digitisation provides the ability to ingest and process voluminous data across different segments in the bank, and opportunities to glean additional insights via visualisation techniques and data analysis.\xa0', 'responsibilities\xa0']
job_description_li: ['elicit automation opportunities through interviews, document analysis, business process descriptions, task and workflow analysis', 'maximise automation opportunities by challenging auditors on their assumptions used in test steps', 'critically evaluate information gathered from multiple sources, reconcile conflicts, decompose high-level information into details, abstract up from low-level information to a general understanding, and distinguish user requests from the underlying true needs', 'shortlist data required to implement automation specifications and engage stakeholders to obtain access to data sources', 'communicate and collaborate with auditors to develop automation specifications', 'serve as the conduit between auditors and the technology teams which manage the underlying bank systems.', 'project manage the end-to-end process to ensure timely delivery of automation opportunities', 'identify opportunities to leverage data analytics and visualisation techniques to generate additional insights', 'have a strong understanding of ibg, gts and rmg systems, data and processes. the objective is to facilitate integrated data analytics at portfolio, borrower, facility, product and transactional levels.\xa0', 'as a team member, this individual supports the delivery of digitalisation initiatives (automation and visualisation solutions).\xa0 and in doing so, enhance the department’s ability to provide greater audit assurance and achieve productivity benefits.']
job_requirement_p: [None]
job_requirement_li: ['at least 4 years of (cumulative) relevant experience, with tertiary education.', 'good understanding corporate / institutional banking group (ibg/gts) and credit risk knowledge', 'knowledge of ibg, gts and rmg related systems, data and processes', 'ability to write sql code', 'business / data analytics, visualisation and dashboard development.\xa0', 'strong business analyst skills required, including a thorough understanding of how to interpret business needs and translate them into application and operational requirements', 'independent self-starter with ability to multitask', 'excellent verbal and written communication skills and the ability to interact professionally with a diverse group, executives, managers, and subject matter experts', 'has a ‘can-do’ attitude']

['your role :', "do you have sharp analytic skills? do you know how to solve challenging problems in elegant ways? we're looking for someone like this to:
 - assist the running of proactive financial crime prevention data analytics exercises
 - support the maintenance of and changes to our compliance data warehouse
 - provide data extraction support for your financial crime prevention and compliance colleagues
 - collaborate with our global analytics teams on various exciting projects and investigations", 'your team :', "you'll be working in the apac financial crime prevention data analytics team. we’re responsible for performing financial crime prevention analytics exercises in apac and provide both day-to-day and change support for the compliance data warehouse. so you'll be joining a team that's passionate about data – we'll value your drive to provide unique insights and your pro-active approach to solving problems."]

 - worked in a similar position before (and you loved it)

 - strong analytical, problem-solving and synthesizing skills (you know how to figure stuff out)

 - a pro-active attitude (you are always brimming with ideas)
 
 you are:

 - a great communicator, you know how to explain complex technical matters in simple terms
 - methodical, concise and accurate, with strong attention to detail
 - a team player', 'you may also apply directly via our career website using below link:', 'https://jobs.ubs.com/1033/asp/tg/cim_jobdetail.asp?partnerid=25008&siteid=5012&areq=180160br', 'to learn more about ubs and other opportunities, please visit www.ubs.com/careers']

skills: ['matlab', 'algorithms', 'c++', 'machine learning', 'c', 'python', 'java', 'simulations', 'linux', 'software engineering', 'programming', 'r&d', 'computer science', 'latex', 'engineering', 'image processing', 'signal processing', 'software development', 'data mining', 'research']
job_description_p: ['about the institute for infocomm research (i²r)', 'the institute for infocomm research (i²r) is a member of the agency for science, technology and research (a*star) family and is singapore’s largest ict research institute. our strategic thrusts are in the spheres of intelligence, communications and media and our research capabilities are in shared sensor networks, public-public/public-private data-sharing platform, big data analytics and visualization solutions. for more information about i2r, please visit www.i2r.a-star.edu.sg', 'we are looking for strong candidates in the field of artificial intelligence and deep learning, with an interest in working on both fundamental algorithms in large-scale machine learning or deep learning, and also applying it to practical problems in vertical domains. the position, based within the program in artificial intelligence at 12r, entails working closely with a highly interdisciplinary team of researchers with training from leading universities like miti stanford and cmu.', 'listed below are problems of interest for this engineering position in the deep learning 2.0 project:', 'multimodal deep learning: towards effective learning from heterogeneous data sources', 'currently, deep learning is applied in various areas such as visual computing, speech recognition, text mining, etc. in each area, the learning model is trained with large amounts of data in isolation. a multimodal learning approach from heterogeneous data sources, including video, speech, text, etc. is necessary to achieve breakthrough in performance.', '\xa0', 'unsupervised deep learning: towards 10x fewer labeled samples', 'labeling large amounts of training data is one of the most time-consuming steps in the deep learning pipeline, and is often not feasible. the aim is to achieve the same performance with 1.0x fewer labeled training samples. this is a strong step in the direction of unsupervised deep learning, where representations are learnt with large amounts of unlabeled unstructured data,', '\xa0', 'deep learning on embedded devices: towards 1.00x smaller models', 'current deep learning models have 10s of millions of neurons, making it infeasible for deployment on mobile and embedded hardware. the aim is to achieve models that are 100x smaller, with little loss in performance. this capability will also be critical for emerging neuromorphic platforms, where the number of spiking neurons is orders of magnitude smaller than in current state-of-the-art deep learning models.', '\xa0', 'online deep learning: towards near realtime (nrt) model updates', 'state-of-the-art deep learning models still take several days to train on expensive gpu infrastructure. a common problem is when new data (including new classes) are constantly added to an evolving, always-learning system. algorithms to move towards real-time updates will be essential.', '\xa0', 'extreme deep learning: training ib neural networks efficiently', 'the high model capacity of deep networks is why increasing amounts of data and model size improves performance. however, there are substantial challenges in hardware and algorithms challenges in training very large models efficiently. the aim is to address these challenges to achieve more efficient training', '\xa0', 'deep learning for spoken language processing and understanding: towards better modeling of human communication', 'language technology has made great advances through deep learning in the past five years, penetrating fields such as speech recognition and machine translation. however, there are still numerous challenges that need to be addressed, ranging from the requirement of specialized linguistic resources to large amounts of annotated data, and to insufficient theoretical grounding in deep learning. this aim attempts to address challenges that are often overlooked by major commercial ai players.', '\xa0', 'white-box deep learning: towards interpretable and contextually informed models', 'current deep learning models are largely black-boxes that are not informed by contextual relations and provide little intuition. improved abilities to regulate the learning process, and interpret the resulting predictions will be essential for the next wave of ai applications - especially for complex learning scenarios and applications involving critical decisions', '\xa0', 'incorporating knowledge graphs into deep learning: towards better understanding of images', 'current deep learning systems today have no real understanding of images, with output typically a bunch of bounding boxes, learnt using a large number of label or sentence-level associations. knowledge graphs like the mit conceptnet will be used to understand higher level semantics and relationships between entities, to improve classification accuracy.', '\xa0', '\xa0', '\xa0']

job_requirement_li: ['minimum bachelor in computer science, statistics, or data science intensive fields, with expertise in one or more of the following areas:  large-scale machine learning deep learning, supervised or unsupervised applying state-of-the-art machine learning techniques to practical problems in different domains  ', 'large-scale machine learning', 'deep learning, supervised or unsupervised', 'applying state-of-the-art machine learning techniques to practical problems in different domains', 'experience in corporate or application oriented environments is a plus', 'ability to work independently as well as in teams', 'good written and communication skills for proposals, reports, and publications', 'experience with one of the following: tensor flow, theano, caffe, cntk', 'strong programming abilities (e. g. perl, bash, c/c++, java, python, r, matlab)', 'computer vision and deep learning skills are highly preferred']

skills: ['research', 'data analysis', 'matlab', 'molecular biology', 'statistics', 'science', 'latex', 'algorithms', 'cell culture', 'biotechnology', 'biochemistry', 'c++', 'machine learning', 'lifesciences', 'teaching', 'project management', 'microsoft office', 'pcr', 'python', 'programming']
job_description_p: ['nus business school (asia accounting research centre) is looking for a suitable candidate to work as a full-time research associate under the supervision of professor ke bin, director of asia accounting research centre. this research is funded by an artificial intelligence and data analytics grant (aida) launched by singapore’s monetary authority of singapore (mas) as part of the financial sector technology and innovation (fsti) scheme under the financial sector development fund (fsdf).', 'responsibilities:', '\xa0']
job_description_li: ['web crawl structured and unstructured (e.g., text) data from public sources;', 'clean and construct structured databases from unstructured data sources;', 'maintain integration scripts for existing data sources;', 'develop generic methods for extracting and standardizing content from unstructured sources.']
job_requirement_p: ['requirements:', 'the duration of the initial contract is one year but the contract can be renewable for up to three years including the initial one year provided that the job candidate performs satisfactorily in the initial contract.', 'salary will be competitive and commensurate with the candidate’s qualification and relevant experience.', 'the position starts from january 1, 2019.', 'interested applicants should send his/her curriculum vitae with complete contact information and any supporting documents to bizfubo@nus.edu.sg.', 'applications will be accepted until the position is filled.']
job_requirement_li: ['have a bachelor or master degree in computer science (or related discipline);', 'high proficiency in natural language processing and web mining using python and other relevant programming skills;', 'ability to apply and modify existing machine learning and text mining methods is highly valued;', 'evidence of creativity and innovation is high valued;', 'knowledge of statistical softwares such as r, spss, stata, or sas is a plus;', 'basic knowledge in asset management/commercial banking/corporate finance/securities/research is a plus.', 'responsible, hardworking, detail oriented, and perfection-seeking;', 'ability to work as a team is a must;', 'excellent verbal and written communication skills;', 'willingness to learn new things and accept challenges.']

skills: ['r&d', 'molecular biology', 'biotechnology', 'lifesciences', 'biochemistry', 'science', 'drug discovery', 'research', 'cell culture', 'algorithms', 'matlab', 'machine learning', 'pharmaceutical industry', 'cell biology', 'chemistry', 'protein chemistry', 'simulations', 'assay development', 'data analysis', 'drug development']
job_description_p: ['about the institute for infocomm research (i²r)', 'the institute for infocomm research (i²r) is a member of the agency for science, technology and research (a*star) family and is singapore’s largest ict research institute. our strategic thrusts are in the spheres of intelligence, communications and media and our research capabilities are in shared sensor networks, public-public/public-private data-sharing platform, big data analytics and visualization solutions. for more information about i2r, please visit www.i2r.a-star.edu.sg', 'the deep learning 2.0 program is a multi-year a*star ai program, focused on capturing the next wave of deep learning. the program is focused on:', '(a) 10x open problems in deep learning algorithmic research thrusts include learning with 10x fewer labeled samples, incorporating knowledge graphs into deep learning, online deep learning, and white box deep learning.', '(b) next generation hardware for deep learning: we are looking beyond gpus and tpus, and reimagining the entire hardware stack for deep learning from algorithms all the way down to silicon', '(c) new emerging enterprise applications for deep learning: ranging from personalized medicine, finance, health-care, iot and advanced semiconductor manufacturing', 'we are looking for a senior researcher who is capable of leading advanced ai methods research (beyond the deep learning hype cycle) on one of the following topics, and its applications to several domains', 'the researcher should be able to conceptualize ambitious r&d programs working with other researchers in dl2, raise funding, build teams and execute. the researcher should also be able to attract top students from the region or beyond. the skills should be complementary to the existing knowhow of the existing dl2 unit.', '\xa0']
job_description_li: ['gans in speech/ vision/ language', 'bayesian learning, causal inference', 'lifelong learning: from concepts to tasks', 'knowledge graphs', 'bottom-up reasoning', 'innovative ideas to tackle the youtube8m data set', 'multimodal q&a systems', 'game theory', 'optimization techniques', 'active deep learning']
job_requirement_p: ['the above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. a*star may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. these policies may be amended from time to time without notice. we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.']
job_requirement_li: ['phd in computer science, statistics, or data science intensive fields, with ieee senior membership, or a dozen top papers in ai conferences, or >1000 citations', 'minimum 5 years of relevant work experience', 'ability to scope long-term ambitious research programs and delivers', 'good interpersonal and communication skills']

skills: ['software development', 'java', 'javascript', 'agile methodologies', 'c#', 'xml', 'sql', 'web services', '.net', 'microsoft sql server', 'jquery', 'mysql', 'asp.net', 'scrum', 'linux', 'web applications', 'html', 'c++', 'ajax', 'subversion']
job_description_p: ['about the company', 'our client is a software house which develops digital products and bespoke solutions for their clients. they have presence in more than 10 countries and are known for their innovative mobile and web applications which include emerging technology projects such as iot, data analytics and ai solutions for clients ranging from startups to mncs. they are currently looking to hire a couple of experienced senior software engineers or tech leads to build on their current capabilities as they expand their clientele.', '\xa0', 'about the job', 'you will:']
job_description_li: ['work with business stakeholders, end users and team members', 'build reliable, scalable and well-tested systems in accordance to the high engineering best practices within the company', 'build consumer-facing applications with features such as ai chatbots, data monitoring, data visualisation, etc', 'continuously research and develop, and keep up to date on newest trends and technologies', 'act as a scrum master or team lead in a small project group, drive technical developments and create the product roadmap together with the relevant stakeholders']
job_requirement_p: ['skills and experience required', "to apply online please use the 'apply' function, alternatively you may send your cv to sarah.yang@randstad.com.sg or contact sarah yang at +65 6510 3633.", 'referrals are greatly appreciated!', '(ea: 94c3609/ r1657816)']
job_requirement_li: ['bachelors in computer science, computer engineering or equivalent', 'more than 5 year experience in full stack development which includes backend development in various languages such as go/node.js/python/php, frontend such as react.js/ember.js/vue.js, and mobile (react native/ios/android)', 'experience of writing automated unit & functional tests', 'strong understanding of data structure, algorithm complexity, etc', 'experience and advocate in good engineering practices in web development (html5 / css3 / javascript)', 'hands-on experience in docker, kubernetes, tdd, linux, api designing, real-time application streaming', 'experience in auto-scaling setup, distributed computing, enterprise-level product development, experience of entire software development cycle of a product from scratch and deployment, releasing for production (ci/cd)', 'passionate about technologies and trends, have strong foundation in computer science and understands internally how programming languages are designed, how they work and how they are implemented']

job_description_p: ['about the institute for infocomm research (i²r)', 'the institute for infocomm research (i²r) is a member of the agency for science, technology and research (a*star) family and is singapore’s largest ict research institute. our strategic thrusts are in the spheres of intelligence, communications and media and our research capabilities are in shared sensor networks, public-public/public-private data-sharing platform, big data analytics and visualization solutions. for more information about i2r, please visit www.i2r.a-star.edu.sg', 'we are looking for strong candidates in the field of artificial intelligence and deep learning, with an interest in working on both fundamental algorithms in large-scale machine learning or deep learning, and also applying it to practical problems in vertical domains. the position, based within the program in artificial intelligence at 12r, entails working closely with a highly interdisciplinary team of researchers with training from leading universities like miti stanford and cmu.', 'listed below are problems of interest for this engineering position in the deep learning 2.0 project:', '\xa0']
job_description_li: ['algorithms: 10x open problems in deep learning algorithmic research: research thrusts include learning with 10x fewer labeled samples, compressing networks by 100x, incorporating knowledge graphs into deep learning, online deep learning, and white-box deep learning.\n  \xa0', 'new emerging enterprise applications: deep learning for personalized finance and fixed-income retirement planning. this will entail scoping and working closely with a world class team of researchers across nus camr1/12r and a leading financial hedge fun partner.']
job_requirement_p: ['the above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. a*star may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. these policies may be amended from time to time without notice. we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.']
job_requirement_li: ['phd in computer science, statistics, data science intensive fields with expertise in one or more of the following areas:  large-scale machine learning deep learning, supervised or unsupervised applying state-of-art machine learning techniques to practical problems in different domains  ', 'large-scale machine learning', 'deep learning, supervised or unsupervised', 'applying state-of-art machine learning techniques to practical problems in different domains', 'possess phd experience in corporate or application oriented environments', 'ability to work independently', 'team player', 'experience with tensor flow, theano, caffe, cntk skills', 'strong programming skills in perl, bash, c/c++, java, python, r, matlab', 'possess computer vision and deep learning skills', 'good interpersonal and communication skills']

job_description_p: ['about the institute for infocomm research (i²r)', 'the institute for infocomm research (i²r) is a member of the agency for science, technology and research (a*star) family and is singapore’s largest ict research institute. our strategic thrusts are in the spheres of intelligence, communications and media and our research capabilities are in shared sensor networks, public-public/public-private data-sharing platform, big data analytics and visualization solutions. for more information about i2r, please visit www.i2r.a-star.edu.sg', 'we are looking for strong candidates in the field of artificial intelligence and deep learning, with an interest in working on both fundamental algorithms in large-scale machine learning or deep learning, and also applying it to practical problems in vertical domains.', 'the position, based within the program in artificial intelligence at i2r, entails working closely with a highly interdisciplinary team of researchers with training from leading universities like mit, stanford and cmu.\xa0 listed below are problems of interest in the deep learning 2.0 project:', 'deep learning application in ame (semiconductor domain): explore state-of-the-art deep learning technologies in advance manufacturing engineering, especially in semiconductor industries. including, but not limited to, yield analysis and prediction, predictive maintenance (pdm), advanced doe analysis and prediction, etc']

job_description_p: ['nus business school (asia accounting research centre) is looking for a suitable candidate to work as a full-time research fellow under the supervision of professor ke bin, director of asia accounting research centre. this research is funded by an artificial intelligence and data analytics grant (aida) launched by singapore’s monetary authority of singapore (mas) as part of the financial sector technology and innovation (fsti) scheme under the financial sector development fund (fsdf).', 'responsibilities:']
job_description_li: ['need to learn basic domain knowledge in asset management/commercial banking/corporate finance/securities/research;', 'work with domain experts to use structured and unstructured data to develop financial forecasting models using state-of-the-art machine learning techniques;']
job_requirement_p: ['requirements:', 'the duration of the initial contract is one year but the contract can be renewable for up to three years including the initial one year provided that the job candidate performs satisfactorily in the initial contract.', 'salary will be competitive and commensurate with the candidate’s qualification and relevant experience.', 'the position starts from january 1, 2019.', 'interested applicants should send his/her curriculum vitae with complete contact information and any supporting documents to bizfubo@nus.edu.sg.', 'applications will be accepted until the position is filled.']
job_requirement_li: ['have a phd degree in computer science or equivalent (phd students close to graduation can be considered too);', 'high proficiency in machine learning modeling based on structured and unstructured data, especially in the financial domain;', 'deep learning and other state-of-the-art machine learning methods are highly valued;', 'high proficiency in natural language processing using python and other relevant programming skills;', 'related prior research experience is a plus;', 'evidence of creativity and innovation is high valued;', 'responsible, hardworking, detail oriented, and perfection-seeking;', 'ability to work as a team is a must;', 'excellent verbal and written communication skills;', 'willingness to learn new things and accept challenges.']

job_description_p:
["vantage hr solutions (ea license no\xa010c4871) is a professional executive search consultancy company registered under the ministry of manpower (mom), singapore.\xa0the keen eye we developed over the years enabled us to make accurate assessments about jobs and candidates.\xa0we distinguish ourselves through our direct working experience as industry-specific professionals from the industries that we serve. hence, we have the trade know-how, professional network and track record to recruit the right talents for different business needs. whether you are seeking the best talents for your organization or looking for a dream career - vantage hr solutions has the edge to meet your expectations.
visit http://vantage.com.sg/\xa0to find out more about our services and other available positions.
our client is a leading public listed multi-national corporation employing more than 10,000 people worldwide across a wide and diverse range of industries in europe, asia & americas. it has established itself as an employer of choice due to its' global presence, reputation, drive for innovation as well as its' emphasis on human capital development.

job_description_li: ['part of the corporate internal audit team', 'specialize in it audit', 'work with global / local business units and subsidiaries across different sectors on audit procedures', 'responsible for planning and executing it audit programs, it audit fieldwork and operational audits.', 'assess the controls effectiveness of itgc and erp systems, review and testing for compliance with best practices, policies and procedures.', 'propose recommendations to improve any weaknesses in the control environment and system vulnerabilities identified.', 'assist in special reviews, data analytics, csa programs', 'you shall have the opportunity to work for a world class and leading global brand name that is both innovation-driven and widely regarded as an employer of choice due to its strong emphasis and premium on human capital and developing its people. excellent opportunity for vertical and horizontal career progression due to the diversity and global presence of the corporation’s operations.', 'permanent position\xa0 ', '2 vacancies required - new headcount due to expansion', 'good career prospects / staff benefits', 'overseas travel required (up to 30%)']
job_requirement_p: ['requirements:', '\napplication:', '\xa0']
job_requirement_li: ['must have a recognised degree in accountancy/ business/ finance/computer science or it related equivalent.', 'cisa and cia/cpa/cfe/ccsa/cissp qualifications and technical knowledge of data analytics (e.g. acl, ideas) including scripting preferred.', 'knowledge of large erp systems, cyber security threats and it general controls (e.g. change controls, access controls, it operations and network security) preferred.', 'willingness to travel on overseas audit assignment when required', 'knowledge of it assurance/ compliance audit/ data analytics advantageous', 'possess good attitude and inter-personal skills to work well with people across a diverse background', 'preferably with it audit / it security experience. ', 'apply via jobsbank or email cv to: careers@vantage.com.sg', 'please include a recent photo, expected salary, last drawn salary, availability/notice period and reason for leaving past employment(s) in your cv.']

job_description_p:
['as a mct cpee max out program engineer, you are to support the max out program manager in project management, liasion with sites on program prioritites and support needed, drive network bkm fan out and alignment. you are expected to be strong in communication to connect with the network, key stakeholders and business partners.\xa0', '\xa0', 'responsibilities :', '\xa0', 'max out program management
 •understand max out program strategy, priorities, and how they relate to company goals
 •lead global, cross-functional task force teams (tfts) or enabling projects that support max out program priorities across the network and drive accountability through clear communication, informal feedback, effective project management and appropriate use of metrics
 •drive continuous improvement of network constraint workstations to bic performance through, •benchmarking and analyze network performance •wpd
 •utilization
 •ma
 •lost time
 •standby time
 •rpt', '•utilize data analytics tools to identify tool bottlenecks, hidden factories and productivity loss
 •partner with pos and tos in the identification of opportunities for improvement in workstation performance\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '\xa0', 'project management
 •drive technical activity on assigned project on daily basis
 •ensure assigned project has appropriate stakeholders, and deliverables and schedule
 •ensure assigned project is progressing on schedule
 •identify and mitigate risks and issue which may impact the project
 •escalate to project sponsor when necessary
 •provide or support (program manager) regular updates to sponsor and key stakeholders on current status, risks and issues as needed', '\xa0', 'site and regional liasion
 •collaborate within the site/region to achieve site’s objective and goals
 •conduct regular 1 on 1s with site/region stakeholders to understand site priorities, challenges and support needed
 •communicate to site/region stakeholders on program priorities, roadmap and any program related changes
 •provide or support (program manager) regular updates to site/region leadership team and stakeholders on network activities, programs, issues, projects, wins or other items that are necessary
 •promote network communication', '\xa0', 'network bkm fan out and alignment
 •identify site bkms and communicate to peer group
 •identify site bkm implementation gap and provide information to site’s stakeholders
 •collaborate with site’s stakeholders to develop implementation roadmap for applicable bkms
 •support in updating network bkm heatmap and implementation matrix
 •conduct or support (program manager) regular update to slt on bkm implementation status', 'communication
 •work closely with program manager to understand program charter, roadmap and priorities
 •facilitate 2 way communication between site and program manager
 •provide regular updates to sponsor and key stakeholders on current status, risks and issues
 •conduct or support (program manager) regular 1 on 1s with site’s stakeholders to understand site priorities, challenges, support needed.
 •conduct or support (program manager) regular communication to site’s stakeholders on program priorities, roadmap and any program related changes
 •conduct or support (program manager) regular updates to site leadership team and stakeholders on network activities, programs, issues, projects, wins or other items that are necessary
 •conduct or support (program manager) regular update to slt on bkm implementation status']

 •bachelor degree in technical/engineering/industrial engineering field
