company_name: singapore national eye centre pte ltd
job_description_p: ['reporting directly to the deputy director of health insights, this is a crucial pioneer hire for the department that is recently set-up by the institution to conduct deep dives into their existing data (demographic/medical/financial) to help solve some of the business problems as well as chart the company’s short to long term strategic direction. in addition, the successful candidate will be highly involved in the growth of the department including strategizing of road map, infrastructure setup and subsequent hiring.', '\u3000', 'required hands-on', 'design implementable analytical solutions/experiments through the use of artificial intelligence to solve various clinical, operational and business problems relating to the 3-pillars of clinical, research and education work', 'build and deploy machine learning algorithms, and other advanced analytics and data visualization', 'data integration - understanding the data assets of the enterprise and be able to lead the discussion about the long-term data integration initiative in order to make it consistent, successful and beneficial. this will include tackling issues on data warehousing, data migration and master data management etc.', '\xa0', 'business partnering', 'partner with a multi-disciplinary clinical, it, finance and operations team to provide deep expertise and advisory on data analytics needs and aligned to business priorities on data transformation', 'working with it, you will support enterprise data architecture and governance initiatives including developing and transforming the current proprietary erp system into implementable information and solutions', '\xa0']
job_description_li: [None]
job_requirement_p: ['degree, masters or phd in statistics, mathematics, data or computer science', 'minimum 3-5 years of proven experience designing implementable analytical solutions to solve business problems utilizing predictive machine learning techniques', 'expertise with analytical tools and languages such as r, python, sas, sql etc alongside familiarity with enterprise data warehouse or big data technologies like hadoop.', 'ideally, you should have some experience dealing with issues on the subject of data integration, data management and data governance etc.', 'analytical, business minded and strong team player that can work with all levels of the organization including senior stakeholders.', 'strong communicator, with clear articulation of findings through presentations and able to demonstrate experience with data visualization', 'able to switch to a ‘fluid’ mindset whilst working in a start-up environment where progress rate might not yet be consistent', 'innovative, agile thinking and experience with test and lean frameworks', '\xa0']

job_title: senior manager (network and data infra), eoid
job_description_p: ['the ministry of home affairs (mha) aspires to be a world-class organisation in delivering safety and security for our people. in pursuing our mission to make singapore our safe and secure best home, we remain always constant and true to our core values of honour and unity.', 'the jobholder will assist the senior assistant director (sad) (network and data infra) to perform the maintenance and engineering support function for the mha-wide enterprise ops infrastructures (eoi) for network transmission/operations, data exchange, and data and video hosting platforms, to ensure high availability and secured services that will meet mha’s operation needs as well as to support the home team’s key operational systems and next generation ops-tech capabilities. he shall also perform other ad-hoc tasks as directed by the sad or higher.\xa0', '\xa0', 'his key responsibilities are as follows:', '\xa0', 'job requirements:', 'for transmission network, network/security operation centre;', 'for data hosting platform;', 'for video hosting platform;', 'relevant systems integration experience', '\xa0', 'all new appointees will be appointed on a two-year contract in the first instance.', 'we wish to inform that only shortlisted candidates will be notified within 30 days upon closing of the advertisement.']
job_description_li: ['assist the sad in the system management of the mha eoi', 'assist the sad to develop and maintain governance on the technical standards and processes for the eoi to ensure the system is robust and secure and the services are delivered effectively and efficiently.', 'assist the sad to carry out the following core duties:', 'contract management', 'fault management', 'configuration management', 'utilisation and resources capacity planning\xa0', 'maintain overall ict security posture', 'monitoring, system controller (syscon) and automation management', 'asset and inventory management', 'project management', 'a recognised degree in computer science or engineering in related field', 'minimum 3 years of relevant working experience managing large scale/enterprise-wide ict infrastructures in a data centre environment', 'professional certifications/trainings in;for transmission network, network/security operation centre;  cisco certified network professional (ccnp/ccna), metro ethernet forum - carrier ethernet certified professional (mef-cecp), certified information systems security professional (cissp), certified information systems manager (cism), for data hosting platform;  have attended basic trainings data analytics and big data technologies have working knowledge on managing relational databases understand the various big data architectures (e.g. lambda etc) and technologies (e.g. hadoop etc.).\xa0 familiar with industry solutions such as cloudera, hortonworks, sap hana and ibm big data platform. for video hosting platform;  have working knowledge and experience in video standards/architecture, video management and surveillance camera technologies familiar with cloud platform for hosting understand big data architecture and technologies  relevant systems integration experience  ', ' for transmission network, network/security operation centre;  cisco certified network professional (ccnp/ccna), metro ethernet forum - carrier ethernet certified professional (mef-cecp), certified information systems security professional (cissp), certified information systems manager (cism),  ', 'cisco certified network professional (ccnp/ccna), metro ethernet forum - carrier ethernet certified professional (mef-cecp), certified information systems security professional (cissp), certified information systems manager (cism),', ' for data hosting platform;  have attended basic trainings data analytics and big data technologies have working knowledge on managing relational databases understand the various big data architectures (e.g. lambda etc) and technologies (e.g. hadoop etc.).\xa0 familiar with industry solutions such as cloudera, hortonworks, sap hana and ibm big data platform.  ', 'have attended basic trainings data analytics and big data technologies', 'have working knowledge on managing relational databases', 'understand the various big data architectures (e.g. lambda etc) and technologies (e.g. hadoop etc.).\xa0', 'familiar with industry solutions such as cloudera, hortonworks, sap hana and ibm big data platform.', ' for video hosting platform;  have working knowledge and experience in video standards/architecture, video management and surveillance camera technologies familiar with cloud platform for hosting understand big data architecture and technologies  relevant systems integration experience', 'have working knowledge and experience in video standards/architecture, video management and surveillance camera technologies', 'familiar with cloud platform for hosting', 'understand big data architecture and technologies', ' relevant systems integration experience ', 'experience in project management and system management', 'understanding of security policies and operational environment', 'good understanding of it infrastructure components, such as server, network, big data hosting, video platform, storage and security', 'understanding of security policies and operational environment', 'understanding of information technology infrastructure library (itil) and business continuity planning (bcp) framework', 'experience in contract management', 'analytical, able to work within tight deadlines, think on his feet', 'able to reconcile different operational requirement and rationalise with various stakeholders on the usage of centralised managed bandwidth resources in the most cost effective manner.', 'good communications and writing skills', 'necessity to respond to incidents that may occur 24/7 \xa0 ']

job_description_p: ['we are looking for a data engineer to join our rapidly expanding data & analytics team. you will help shape how we build and grow our service in the region. we look for self-starters who demand the best.', 'key responsibilities:']
job_description_li: ['\xa0develop etl/elt jobs to integrate new data into the data warehouse or build new reporting schemas', 'develop data pipelines, both bath and realtime from various platforms into the data lake', 'manage various data platforms and seek out new technologies to improve efficiency', 'develop advanced analytical models that help the business identify trends within customer base and behavior', 'work closely with the business to understand data needs and create data sets to enable reporting and dashboards to monitor business performance', 'ensure the data warehouse load jobs run as per schedule and data availability to the business is uninterrupted', 'continuously improve the information management platforms of the company to leverage benefits']
job_requirement_p: ['desired skills and experience']
job_requirement_li: ['minimum 3 years of solid development experience within a data warehouse/information management team with strong understanding of programming languages like java, python, javascript and sql.', 'hands on experience in full-stack development, design and architecture. experience in creating a rest api that can handle a production load (code + deploy).', 'familiarity with aws (dynamodb, redshift, s3, ec2, rds, lambda) (will be an advantage but not mandatory)', 'minimum 3 years development experience with etl/elt tools (preferably pentaho di, informatica, datastage or talend)', 'proven experience with data warehousing and big data technologies', 'working knowledge of big data technologies like hadoop, hive, spark and streaming/messaging services like kafka,spark streaming.', 'solid understanding of some bi tools such as cognos, qlikview or tableau.', 'comfortable working in dynamic fast paced environment with competing priorities. self-starter and willing and able to learn on your own', 'work well within a team environment and willing to accommodate task and duties that maybe outside of your jd for limited time periods']

job_description_p: ['introducing our firm', 'bioquest advisory is a singapore based consulting business led by experienced industry veterans from global technology and consulting firms. we partner our industry clients to transform their business and build sustainable growth.', 'our key expertise: robotic process automation, data analytics, business systems implementation, business strategy & transformation, process improvement, supply chain management, financial management, governance & risk management.', '\u200bour clients consist of global mncs and singapore businesses spanning across multiple industries and asia pacific countries.\xa0', '\u200bthe opportunity', 'bioquest advisory is at the exciting phase of our growth in singapore and across apac region and is looking for experienced consulting practitioners with strong technical skills in emerging technology in the area of artificial intelligence and data analytics to be part of our journey.', 'the role', 'you would be part of our management team to steer the growth of the firm.', 'your role involves:', 'joiners at manager level would be guided to grow in this role.']
job_description_li: ['building and maintaining a strong sales pipeline', 'identifying opportunities in new emerging technology', 'working in close collaboration with our technology business partners', 'leading engagements and managing senior stakeholders', 'advice clients on leading and best practice', 'developing methodologies and tools with subject matter experts', 'growing and managing our talent pool']
job_requirement_p: ['your profile', 'attributes we are looking for:', 'join us', 'at bioquest, we value collaboration, teamwork and knowledge transfers. our culture is friendly and supportive with a strong emphasis on ethics, diversity and inclusiveness.', 'as you grow with our firm, you would be able to leverage on your expertise to help transform our clients’ business and gain experience for your personal professional development. we are committed to providing opportunities and coaching to grow our talents.', 'we are an equal opportunity employer.', '\xa0']
job_requirement_li: ['degree in information technology or any other related discipline', '4 to 8 years of good track record in delivering technology projects', 'strong capabilities in understanding clients’ business challenges and translating to sales opportunities', 'good technical understanding in emerging technology (i.e. robotic process automation, data analytics) and it infrastructure (i.e. server, it security, network, data centre)', 'good communicator, able to think-on-your-feet, have a customer service attitude', 'demonstrate leadership skills and ability to effectively communicate and manage change\xa0', 'highly motivated with a passion in technology and consulting.', 'effective communicator and excellent problem solver who can prioritize workloads in a dynamic environment.', 'strong people skills to manage stakeholders and internal talents', 'genuine interest in a long-term career with a fast growing firm']

skills: ['research', 'lecturing', 'teaching', 'science', 'mathematical modeling', 'algorithms', 'latex', 'matlab', 'simulations', 'computer science', 'data analysis', 'higher education', 'university teaching', 'english', 'machine learning', 'programming', 'qualitative research', 'statistics', 'entrepreneurship', 'numerical analysis']
job_description_p: ['the department of communications and new media at national university of singapore is looking to fill the following educator track (teaching only) positions.', 'senior lecturer\xa0in:', '(a) communication management (1 position)', 'we seek applicants with expertise in public relations and corporate communication, with experience (industry related and/or teaching) in one or more of the following areas:', '(b) interactive media design (1 position)', 'we seek applicants with expertise in data science, interactive media design and software studies. the applicant will have (industry related and/or teaching) experience in one or more of the following areas :', '(c) digital media cultures (1 position)', 'we seek applicants with expertise in cultural studies; new media art and digital film criticism, and; cultural and critical theories. the applicant will have (practice related and/or teaching) experience in:']
job_description_li: ['social media marketing and management', 'organisational and small group communication', 'public speaking and critical reasoning', 'crisis and risk communication', 'leadership, organisation and new media', 'data analytics, big data, data visualisation, and use of software tools such as r and python, and web technologies.', 'computational media and communication, and artificial intelligence', 'game studies', 'user interface, user experience and hci design', 'digital media cultures', 'globalisation and new media', 'culture and creative industry studies', 'digital storytelling']
job_requirement_p: ['successful candidates must have a phd in communications or a closely affiliated discipline by the appointment of start date and a record of excellence in teaching in large comprehensive universities. a passion for working closely with students and a commitment to student learning are essential. successful candidates are also expected to have experience with online teaching and the development of moocs.', 'appointment grade/requirements:\xa0phd degree or equivalent; with approximately 5 or more years of teaching experience (preferably at\xa0lecturer level, but experience as teaching assistant/instructor may be considered on a case-by-case basis)\xa0and evidence of impact in higher education settings required.', 'responsibilities:\xa0successful candidates are expected to teach five modules per academic year. other duties include supervising 4-6 honours students and graduate students, academic advising and undertaking service roles including coordinating the department’s compulsory internship programme.', 'the department of communications and new media was established as a full programme in 2004. it is currently ranked #1 in asia (the2018) and #14 in the world (qs2018). it has one of the largest student enrolments in the faculty of arts and social sciences. it offers undergraduate, honours and phd programmes in communications and new media studies, with an innovative curriculum that introduces students to key debates in the areas of media studies, communication management, interactive media design and cultural studies. its curriculum provides students with practical skills in social media management, user experience and user interface design, and digital marketing. its students undertake industry immersion through its compulsory internship programme. the department also offers an undergraduate double degree with the school of business; undergraduate minors in interactive media design and cultural studies, and the cultural studies in asia phd programme. its research concentrations are media effects and psychology, health communication and cultural studies.', 'please send in your application to ms jasmin tay (cnmbox15@nus.edu.sg). instructions on the application procedure can be found via the link - http://www.fas.nus.edu.sg/cnm/about-cnm/job-openings/academic-jobs', 'further information about the department can be found at: http://www.fas.nus.edu.sg/cnm/', 'more information about the university can be found at: http://www.nus.edu.sg/', 'applications close by 2 november 2018.', 'only short-listed candidates will be notified.']
job_requirement_li: [None]

job_requirement_p: ['successful candidates must have a phd in communications\xa0or a closely affiliated discipline by the appointment of start date and a record of excellence in teaching in large comprehensive universities. a passion for working closely with students and a commitment to student learning are essential. successful candidates are also expected to have experience with online teaching and the development of moocs.', 'appointment grade/ requirements:\xa0phd degree or equivalent; some teaching experience in higher education settings\xa0will be an advantage.', 'successful candidates are expected to teach five modules per academic year. other duties include supervising 4-6 honours students and graduate students, academic advising and undertaking service roles including coordinating the department’s compulsory internship programme.', 'the department of communications and new media was established as a full programme in 2004. it is currently ranked #1 in asia (the2018) and #14 in the world (qs2018). it has one of the largest student enrolments in the faculty of arts and social sciences. it offers undergraduate, honours and phd programmes in communications and new media studies, with an innovative curriculum that introduces students to key debates in the areas of media studies, communication management, interactive media design and cultural studies. its curriculum provides students with practical skills in social media management, user experience and user interface design, and digital marketing. its students undertake industry immersion through its compulsory internship programme. the department also offers an undergraduate double degree with the school of business; undergraduate minors in interactive media design and cultural studies, and the cultural studies in asia phd programme. its research concentrations are media effects and psychology, health communication and cultural studies.', 'please send in your application to ms jasmin tay (cnmbox15@nus.edu.sg). instructions on the application procedure can be found via the link - http://www.fas.nus.edu.sg/cnm/about-cnm/job-openings/academic-jobs', 'further information about the department can be found at: http://www.fas.nus.edu.sg/cnm/', 'more information about the university can be found at: http://www.nus.edu.sg/', 'applications close by 2 november 2018.', 'only short-listed candidates will be notified.']

job_description_p: ['the department of communications and new media at national university of singapore is looking to fill the following educator track (teaching only) positions.', 'instructor (educator track) in:', '(a) communication management (1 position)', 'we seek applicants with expertise in public relations and corporate communication, with experience (industry related and/or teaching) in one or more of the following areas:', '(b) interactive media design (1 position)', 'we seek applicants with expertise in data science, interactive media design and software studies. the applicant will have (industry related and/or teaching) experience in one or more of the following areas :', '(c) digital media cultures (1 position)', 'we seek applicants with expertise in cultural studies; new media art and digital film criticism, and; cultural and critical theories. the applicant will have (practice related and/or teaching) experience in:']
job_description_li: ['social media marketing and management', 'organisational and small group communication', 'public speaking and critical reasoning', 'crisis and risk communication', 'leadership, organisation and new media', 'data analytics, big data, data visualisation, and use of software tools such as r and python, and web technologies.', 'computational media and communication, and artificial intelligence', 'game studies', 'user interface, user experience and hci design', 'digital media cultures', 'globalisation and new media', 'culture and creative industry studies', 'digital storytelling']
job_requirement_p: ['successful candidates must have a phd in communications (or a ma for instructor position) or a closely affiliated discipline by the appointment of start date and a record of excellence in teaching in large comprehensive universities. a passion for working closely with students and a commitment to student learning are essential. successful candidates are also expected to have experience with online teaching and the development of moocs.', 'appointment grade/\xa0requirements:', 'master’s degree with good knowledge, skills and expertise in relevant field; approximately 2 years of teaching experience.', 'responsibilities: successful candidates are expected to teach five modules per academic year. other duties include supervising 4-6 honours students and graduate students, academic advising and undertaking service roles including coordinating the department’s compulsory internship programme.', 'the department of communications and new media was established as a full programme in 2004. it is currently ranked #1 in asia (the2018) and #14 in the world (qs2018). it has one of the largest student enrolments in the faculty of arts and social sciences. it offers undergraduate, honours and phd programmes in communications and new media studies, with an innovative curriculum that introduces students to key debates in the areas of media studies, communication management, interactive media design and cultural studies. its curriculum provides students with practical skills in social media management, user experience and user interface design, and digital marketing. its students undertake industry immersion through its compulsory internship programme. the department also offers an undergraduate double degree with the school of business; undergraduate minors in interactive media design and cultural studies, and the cultural studies in asia phd programme. its research concentrations are media effects and psychology, health communication and cultural studies.', 'refer to\xa0http://www.fas.nus.edu.sg/cnm/about-cnm/job-openings/academic-jobs for more information.', 'applications close by 2 november 2018.', 'only short-listed candidates will be notified.']

job_description_p: ['this is an exciting opportunity to join one of the leading and growing university of singapore. we are seeking for a candidate with prior internal & external auditing experience, preferably with good working knowledge of data analytics, to be part of our newly created audit team.\xa0', 'as a senior assistant director, you will be reporting to the deputy director and will be responsible for planning and conducting various internal audits, which may cover financial, operational, compliance and it systems of controls. you will also have ad-hoc responsibilities such as special/specific investigations and reviews or supporting senior internal audit leadership with planning and administrative assistance.', 'key responsibilities:\xa0 ', 'your roles and responsibilities would include the following:']
job_description_li: ['develop and review audit universe (auditable units: by business units and/or processes)', 'develop and review audit risk assessment methodology', 'develop and review risk-based audit plans (by business units/processes)', 'develop and review audit budget required to complete risk-based audit plans', 'develop and review internal audit programmes', 'complete relevant audits as required in the approved audit plans', 'perform special investigations as and when required', 'review audit working-papers to ensure its quality meets iia standards', 'review and evaluate policy/procedures/system designs for any gaps in its adequacy & effectiveness', 'develop/utilise data analytic tools/scripts, where applicable', 'provide practical and value-added opinions and recommendations', 'issue timely audit reports', 'provide on-the-job training to supporting team members', 'provide advisory services to business unites and auditees as and when required', 'actively engage the various business units to build good partnership', 'coordinate with internal colleagues and external audit firms on the audit schedule; meetings and resources required', 'assist in all administrative work required for running of the department.']
job_requirement_p: ['if you are looking for a career that is rewarding, fulfilling and one that makes a difference to enhancing accountability over the use and management of public funds and resources, join our internal audit office now. \xa0\xa0', 'we regret that only shortlisted candidate will be notified.']
job_requirement_li: ['bachelor degree in accountancy or any related discipline', 'hold professional qualifications (e.g. cia/crma/cisa/cfe/ca)', 'at least 10 years of audit experience (internal & external)', 'working knowledge of data analysis software such as acl/tableau would be a plus', 'familiarity with sap/workday systems would be an added advantage', 'relevant audit experience in the educational/research industry is preferred \xa0', 'able to work independently', 'strong analytical and critical thinking skills', 'meticulous with a keen eye for details', 'excellent communication and interpersonal skills to deal with all levels of management as well as external professionals', 'strong report-writing and presentation skills']

job_description_li: ['develop hardware and software control architectures to support r&d in the areas of offshore hydrodynamics and fluid-structure interactions. this includes developing, documenting, and direct software system testing, troubleshooting, and verification procedures.', 'develop engineering requirements, specification and validation criteria for high-quality research using combinations of physical experiments, sensing, numerical simulations as well as data analytics to develop integrated physical-numerical modelling & simulations.', 'survey literature and implement state-of-the-art techniques to solve challenging problems', 'collaborate with industry partners, affiliated research institutes and other relevant stakeholders to assist in securing further research grants.', 'any other duties as assigned by supervisor.']

job_requirement_li: ['masters/ph.d. in electrical engineering, mechatronics or other related disciplines.', 'preferably 3 years of relevant postdoctoral/research/industry experience with competent knowledge in some of the following areas:', 'strong working knowledge of control systems and formal control theory', 'experience in control system applications using advanced/pid controllers for position, speed control of ac/dc servo motors and stepper motors', 'knowledgeable in embedded system design, microprocessor architecture and real-time programming algorithms, embedded board level c/c++ programming experience in motion control', 'linux development experience will be an advantage', 'experience with embedded systems and real time applications will be an advantage', 'knowledge of common plc/pac/scada systems', 'exposure to field bus communications and networking systems', 'knowledge of 3d cad tools (dassault, ptc, and/or autodesk) and software like labview, matlab, and simulink etc.', 'experience with common engineering simulation and prototyping tools', 'good interpersonal and communications skills.', 'ability to adapt and work effectively as members of a team.', 'good command of written and spoken english language.', 'resourceful and self-driven with a high degree of professional integrity.']

company_name: technology centre for offshore and marine, singapore ltd.
job_description_p: ['about technology centre for offshore and marine singapore', 'tcoms is a national centre of excellence established by the agency for science, technology and research (a*star) and the national university of singapore (nus) to spur research excellence and advance singapore’s marine & offshore engineering (m&oe) industry. the centre is also supported by the singapore economic development board (edb) and the maritime & port authority of singapore (mpa), and seeks to develop and validate innovative concepts and solutions for m&oe operations. through strategic global partnerships with industry and research institutions, tcoms aims to push frontiers in the development of safe, reliable and sustainable future systems for mankind. a key feature of tcoms is a next-generation ocean basin with forefront simulation capabilities.', 'job description']
job_description_li: ['perform research in the areas of offshore hydrodynamics and fluid-structure interactions pertaining to ocean hydrodynamic environment and behaviour of marine & offshore vessels and floating systems in challenging environments.', 'conduct extensive and high-quality research using combinations of physical experiments, sensing, numerical simulations using cfd and/or potential flow-based models or other relevant techniques, as well as data analytics to develop integrated physical-numerical modelling & simulations.', 'collaborate with industry partners, affiliated research institutes and other relevant stakeholders to assist in securing further research grants.', 'any other duties as assigned by supervisor.']
job_requirement_p: ['the above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. a*star may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. these policies may be amended from time to time without notice. we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.']
job_requirement_li: ['a masters/ph.d. from reputable universities in civil engineering, mechanical engineering, ocean engineering, marine engineering, offshore engineering, physical oceanography, applied mathematics or other related disciplines.', 'preferably 3 years of relevant postdoctoral/research/industry experience with competent knowledge in some of the following areas.deep knowledge in using cfd and/or potential flow-based models to model and simulate ocean wave hydrodynamics, such as nonlinear wave-wave interactions, wave breaking, and wave growth evolution. physical modelling in wave flume, wave tank or ocean basin. sensing, data analytics and machine learning. knowledge of following numerical methods/software is an advantage: higher order spectral method (hosm), boundary element method (bem) or equivalent potential flow method; and openfoam, starccm+ or equivalent cfd software ', 'deep knowledge in using cfd and/or potential flow-based models to model and simulate ocean wave hydrodynamics, such as nonlinear wave-wave interactions, wave breaking, and wave growth evolution.', 'physical modelling in wave flume, wave tank or ocean basin.', 'sensing, data analytics and machine learning.', 'knowledge of following numerical methods/software is an advantage: higher order spectral method (hosm), boundary element method (bem) or equivalent potential flow method; and openfoam, starccm+ or equivalent cfd software  ', 'higher order spectral method (hosm), boundary element method (bem) or equivalent potential flow method; and', 'openfoam, starccm+ or equivalent cfd software', 'good interpersonal and communications skills.', 'ability to adapt and work effectively as members of a team.', 'good command of written and spoken english language.', 'resourceful and self-driven with a high degree of professional integrity.']

job_description_p: ['introducing our firm', 'bioquest advisory is a singapore based consulting business led by experienced industry veterans from global technology and consulting firms. we partner our industry clients to transform their business and build sustainable growth.', 'our key expertise: robotic process automation, data analytics, business systems implementation, business strategy & transformation, process improvement, supply chain management, financial management, governance & risk management.', '\u200b \u200bour clients consist of global mncs and singapore businesses spanning across multiple industries and asia pacific countries.\xa0', '\u200bthe opportunity', 'bioquest advisory is at the exciting phase of our growth in singapore and across apac region and is looking for experienced robotic process automation practitioners with strong hands-on technical skills to be part of our journey.', 'the role', 'you would be leading our robotic process automation (rpa) project team to partner our clients on their rpa journey. you would be leveraging on your deep knowledge and experience in a variety of rpa solutions to provide leadership in robotic process design, rpa process identification workshops, rpa development, testing and deployment methodologies. quality and sustainability of the automated process is of high importance.', 'your work-scope is not static but dynamic according to each project’s requirements. you would have the opportunity to work with our functional subject matter experts and clients across industries around the asia region.']
job_description_li: [None]
job_requirement_p: ['your profile', 'join us', 'at bioquest, we value collaboration, teamwork and knowledge transfers. our culture is friendly and supportive with a strong emphasis on ethics, diversity and inclusiveness.', 'as you grow with our firm, you would be able to leverage on your expertise to help transform our clients’ business and gain experience for your personal professional development. we are committed to providing opportunities and coaching to grow our talents.', 'we are an equal opportunity employer.', '\xa0']
job_requirement_li: ['degree in information technology or any other related discipline', 'at least 3 years of experience in rpa solution implementation and certified in at least 1 of the top rpa solutions (uipath, blue prism, automation anywhere)', 'more than 5 years of experience in application development, programming in .net and object-oriented design', 'good knowledge and experience in robotic process design, rpa configuration, testing, support', 'strong analytical and problem-solving skills', 'good communicator, able to think-on-your-feet, have a customer service attitude', 'enjoy working in a team and is a good team leader and player']

job_requirement_p: ['your profile', 'attributes we are looking for:', 'join us', 'at bioquest, we value collaboration, teamwork and knowledge transfers. our culture is friendly and supportive with a strong emphasis on ethics, diversity and inclusiveness.', 'as you grow with our firm, you would be able to leverage on your expertise to help transform our clients’ business and gain experience for your personal professional development. we are committed to providing opportunities and coaching to grow our talents.', 'we are an equal opportunity employer.', '\xa0']
job_requirement_li: ['degree in business, management, technology or any other related discipline', 'strong capabilities in understanding clients’ business challenges and translating to sales opportunities', 'good understanding of technology disrupters, impact of technology on industries and market trends', '4 to 8 years of good track record in delivering business consulting projects, preferably to large mncs in any of the following areas:technology implementation customer service transformation project management operational transformation finance transformation process improvement change management governance, risk and controls shared service  ', 'technology implementation', 'customer service transformation', 'project management', 'operational transformation', 'finance transformation', 'process improvement', 'change management', 'governance, risk and controls', 'shared service', 'good communicator, able to think-on-your-feet, have a customer service attitude', 'demonstrate leadership skills and ability to effectively communicate and manage change\xa0', 'highly motivated with a passion in business consulting and good understanding of technology disrupters', 'effective communicator and excellent problem solver who can prioritize workloads in a dynamic environment.', 'strong people skills to manage stakeholders and internal talents', 'genuine interest in a long-term career with a fast growing firm']

job_description_p: ['introducing our firm', 'bioquest advisory is a singapore based consulting business led by experienced industry veterans from global technology and consulting firms. we partner our industry clients to transform their business and build sustainable growth.', 'our key expertise: robotic process automation, data analytics, business systems implementation, business strategy & transformation, process improvement, supply chain management, financial management, governance & risk management.', 'our clients consist of global mncs and singapore businesses spanning across multiple industries and asia pacific countries. \xa0', 'the opportunity', '\u200bbioquest advisory is at the exciting phase of our growth in singapore and across apac region and is looking for talented programmers who are passionate about emerging technology to be part of the journey.', 'the role', 'you would be trained in specific technologies and be part of our business & technology advisory team to provide it consulting services to our clients.', 'you would work within the project team to partner our clients on an end-to-end project journey including user workshops, system analysis & design to development, testing and go-live support.', 'each project is uniquely customised to our client’s requirements. your work-scope is not static but dynamic according to each project’s requirements. consulting is an exciting and dynamic career with good exposure across industries, technologies, business practices and opportunities to work with a diverse groups\xa0 of subject experts and clients.']

job_description_li: ['dbs consumer banking and group technology is looking for passionate frontend engineers to work on our in-house web framework for crafting and assembling our next generation consumer experiences.', 'if you are the kind of engineer who is passionate about bringing great experiences to life and love working in a collaborative environment with your product and experiences, then we want to talk to you.', 'develop applications following best practices of accessibility and test-driven development.', 'create reusable, testable, organized, efficient, and self-documenting code/components.', 'partner closely with design and product teams to craft product experiences while providing technical guidance and solutions\xa0', 'deliver code in a devops environment.', 'encourage code craftsmanship across team.', 'deliver code in an agile team environment.', 'lead code reviews to drive teams to the highest standards for web apps.', 'drive teams to follow clean code principles.']

job_requirement_li: ['7+ years professional application/frontend development experience.', 'hands on experience on at least two of the following javascript frameworks \t emberjs reactjs angular (1.x or >2) backbone dojo  ', 'emberjs', 'reactjs', 'angular (1.x or >2)', 'backbone', 'dojo', 'a sound understanding of redux, webpack, styled-components, es6, jest.', 'a solid experience building applications on top of restful apis.', 'nodejs experience', 'experience in ui testing and code quality tools (jasmine, mocha, cucumber, bdd, tdd, jslint, etc...)', 'understand the paradigms and techniques associated with web page performance and degradation; how to analyze, apply measures, and resolve bottlenecks', 'demonstrable experience in object oriented javascript without the use of a library or framework \t able to explain advanced concepts native to the javascript language - understanding of ecma6 standards is a big plus able to follow best coding practice with javascript. ie: avoiding global variables, namespaces, modularity, inheritance, performance, closures \xa0  ', 'able to explain advanced concepts native to the javascript language - understanding of ecma6 standards is a big plus', 'able to follow best coding practice with javascript. ie: avoiding global variables, namespaces, modularity, inheritance, performance, closures \xa0', 'solid knowledge of algorithms, design patterns, and componentization approaches.', 'experience with cross-browser, cross-platform, and design constraints on the web.', 'experience with css pre-processors (sass, less)', 'ability to operate effectively both independently and within a team environment', 'cloud experience a big plus']

job_description_p:
['do you have a knack of intersecting the data and storytelling? are you passionate about finding the story the data is telling, and using it to help drive the key decisions ? do you want to be part of a cutting edge team who are leaders both within ubs and across the financial services industry?\xa0
 we’re looking for someone , who can help us :
 
 • support the it and business functions to drive their key decisions based on data analytics
 • identify the opportunities in automation and operation efficiency
 • perform in-depth analysis of events, patterns, predicates from the operations data
 • integrate data from various data sources to provide holistic view
 • develop reports and dashboards for internal and external consumption
 • support advanced exploratory analytics to help understand the effectiveness of automation
 • provide cross-team support for multiple application platforms and verticals
 • perform data anomaly detection and reporting
 • participate in larger data management projects such as big data or event monitoring', '\xa0', "you'll be working in the infrastructure security engineering - automation & tooling enablement team across the core locations. we are working to identify and automate areas of technology and business operations to achieve more efficient, service based organization which is able to meet to demands of the business both now and in the future. the team is also responsible for driving the automation adoption culture within the organization and run the continual service improvements within the automation programme.", '\xa0', 'you may also apply directly via our career website using below link:', 'https://jobs.ubs.com/tgwebhost/jobdetails.aspx?partnerid=25008&siteid=5012&areq=182762br', '\xa0', 'to learn more about ubs and other opportunities, please visit www.ubs.com/careers']
job_description_li: [None]
job_requirement_p:
['you have:
 - strong analytical skills, with the capability to understand requirements , deliver the desired analysis
 - ability to convert data into story with adequate visualization and reporting
 - solid experience in data analysis tools such as tableau, splunk, loom
 - sound knowledge of monitoring tools like netcool, appdynamics\xa0
 - experienced at working in global, large enterprise environments, particularly financial services
 - adaptable and able to work with multiple teams and at multiple levels to understand the scope of automation opportunities
 - problem solving capacity for how to help other analyze and improve
 - excellent verbal and written communication']

job_description_p:
['description', "the manager/senior manager uses data analytics and determines new strategies to make production processes more efficient to meet organisation's goals. he/she establishes, implements and manages projects to meet operational objectives. he/she manages his/her team resources and balances between production requirement and manpower resources to ensure organisation's sustainability. he/she integrates quality principles and methodology to enhance engineering performance within the organisation.
 
 in addition the manager/senior manager evaluates the organisation’s approach towards a lean enterprise and uses data analytics for business insights identification. he/she drives innovation practices in the organisation and review manufacturing processes to reduce working capital and optimize inventory levels.
 
 as a people manager, the manager oversees manpower, financial, training and resource planning deployment within the organisation. he displays a high level of organisational awareness and leadership skills by working in a consultative manner with other departments/sections within the organisation."]
job_description_li: ['develop change management programmes based on an understanding of current and desired future states and teams impacted by the change', 'construct and implement actionable and targeted change management plans – including stakeholder analysis, communications planning, change impacts, change agent network, organizational readiness, and training plans', 'fact-base analysis of options\xa0 with quantitative analytics', 'facilitate one-on-one discussions, surveys, focus groups, workshops, etc. to articulate change vision and objectives, understand stakeholder needs and issues, and gather input for assessments', 'ensure that change management initiatives and activities are in alignment with overall program plans, objectives, and timelines', 'develop reusable processes for efficiencies across projects', 'develop and maintain key project documents including logs of risks, issues and lessons', 'monitor and report on progress, raising exceptions with the relevant authority as appropriate and recommendations for change / improvement where needed', 'evaluation and measuring effectiveness of change  follow on project refresh progresses paperless initiatives (approval flows for finance) transformation support for salesforce  ', 'follow on project refresh progresses', 'paperless initiatives (approval flows for finance)', 'transformation support for salesforce']

company_name: ministry of social and family development
job_description_p: ['the sector planning and development division works with partners in the social service sector on the overall strategy, plans and capability building for the sector at a macro level.', 'you will drive manpower data collection and analysis, to feed into manpower policy and planning for the social service sector.', 'responsibilities:', 'you should have a strong interest and passion for data work, and be able to draw insights from data \xa0to inform policy analysis and formulation.', 'your key responsibilities would include:', '\xa0', 'competencies required: ', 'functional/technical competencies', 'generic competencies']
job_description_li: ['managing the collection and analysis of manpower data through surveys of vwos/ social service organisations, including driving the set-up of improved systems for data collection and analysis, and cross-linking manpower data with other databases.', 'assessing the state of manpower in the sector by leveraging on data, including demand and supply analyses, working with other msf teams to conduct deep-dive analysis of specific sub-sectors, and identifying gaps and weaknesses in our sector’s manpower profile that may require a policy response.\xa0', 'collaborating with internal counterparts, other government agencies and educational institutes to review and address longer-term manpower pipeline issues, e.g. capacity planning for pre-employment training (pet) and continuous education and training (cet).', 'tracking utilisation and reviewing implementation of the vwo-charities capability fund (vcf) by ncss, to better support capability building for the social service sector.', 'tertiary education in a related discipline, preferably in the social sciences, data science, or equivalent, with at least 1 year of relevant work/internship experience.', 'strong data analytics skills within the context of policy development, and familiarity with or strong interest to learn use of relevant software, e.g. tableau, r, python', 'ability to translate policy considerations into implementation, balancing strategic policy objectives with practical ground realities.', 'a good understanding of singapore’s social service sector/ landscape would be an advantage.', 'strong interpersonal skills; comfortable working with people of all levels and able to build good collaborative relationships with internal and external stakeholders.', 'resourceful, ability to multi-task and work independently, including managing operational issues and project timelines.']

job_description_p: ['the senior financial analyst is responsible to provide sound financial analysis to support business decisions. the role will cover both in-depth pricing analysis, implementation efforts as well as working on financial data analytics to help explain business trends, drivers’ movements, corridors changes as well as product mix shift', 'he/she reports to the senior director, revenue and pricing for asia pacific and is based in singapore.', 'the incumbent is a self-starter with an analytical and inquisitive mind and am driven to communicate business performance to senior leadership in an efficient and effective manner. he/she will collaborate with internal partners from finance, systems, analytics team to produce in-depth analysis of financial results and revenue driver trends and movements.']

job_requirement_li: ['produce quality reporting and analysis on pricing changes, business revenue drivers and financial results to key stakeholders and partners', 'provide support to business function on detailed pricing analysis and support billing /system implementation', 'identify key revenue trends through a combination of analytics, research, discussions with business partners.', 'perform adhoc revenue analysis for management. proactively identify and communicate business implications of analysis. collaborate with cross-teams to enhance quality of management reports.', 'demonstrates analytical, interpersonal, organizational, and communication skills.', 'collaborates well with different teams from finance, systems, analytics and able to work through the matrix organization structure.', 'high degree of connectedness and ability to grasp and understand conceptual models', 'good in data visualization and has superior analytical and problem solving skills and strong attention to detail', 'ability to multi-task and prioritize in a fast-paced environment with a high degree of commitment to meeting timelines', 'excellent communication skills', 'expertise in microsoft excel and powerpoint required; ibm cognos tm1 and hyperion experience would be an advantage', 'conceptual knowledge of financial database is beneficial', 'bachelor’s degree in finance (accountancy / business) or equivalent with at least 7 years relevant post qualification experience']

job_description_p: ['the institute for infocomm research (i²r) is a member of the agency for science, technology and research (a*star) family and is singapore’s largest ict research institute. our strategic thrusts are in the spheres of intelligence, communications and media and our research capabilities are in shared sensor networks, public-public/public-private data-sharing platform, big data analytics and visualisation solutions. for more information about i²r, please visit www.i2r.a-star.edu.sg\n \n successful candidate will be expected to:', 'investigate innovative computer vision and machine learning technologies and algorithms for activity recognition from videos, imitative learning for task learning, etc', 'participate in\xa0demo task design, system and environment setup, image capture from first-person-view and third-person-view, video data collection, annotation, training machine training models for visual object recognition, tracking, and human activity recognition, evaluations, etc.', '\xa0']
job_description_li: [' investigate innovative computer vision and machine learning technologies and algorithms for activity recognition from videos, imitative learning for task learning, etc ', ' participate in\xa0demo task design, system and environment setup, image capture from first-person-view and third-person-view, video data collection, annotation, training machine training models for visual object recognition, tracking, and human activity recognition, evaluations, etc. ']
job_requirement_p: ['minimum bachelor degree in computer science, software engineering, electrical engineering, or related field', 'possess experience on machine learning for computer vision, programming experience on\xa0python, opencv, tensorflow, etc', 'the above eligibility criteria are not exhaustive. a*star may include additional selection criteria based on its prevailing recruitment policies. these policies may be amended from time to time without notice. we regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified']

skills: ['product management', 'business analysis', 'data analysis', 'project management', 'product development', 'analysis', 'management', 'process improvement', 'agile methodologies', 'analytics', 'competitive analysis', 'cross-functional team leadership', 'microsoft office', 'microsoft excel', 'marketing', 'healthcare', 'program management', 'business development', 'leadership', 'requirements analysis']
job_description_p: ['since 2011, we’ve had a clear mission: money without borders. built by and for people who live global lives, we’re the fairest, easiest way to manage your money across borders.', 'today, customers have paid over £1 billion into their borderless accounts and are saving themselves £60 million every month in bank fees. yet we’re moving less than 1% of the world’s money. there’s still heaps to do and we can’t do it alone.', 'we’re looking for the first product analyst to join our rapidly growing growing singapore office', "so, what's the job?", 'you will be working with transferwise asia-pacific team to provide the best possible experience for transferwise customers using our products, driving changes that impact our kpis, reduce costs and improve convenience.', 'how you will create impact']
job_description_li: ['your work would be instrumental in successfully launching the transferwise card in asia pacific, reaching millions of customers, bringing a truly revolutionary to the market.', 'your learnings from data analytics will quantify opportunities that will guide the team to prioritise what to build next, building a strong product roadmap to maximise customer impact', 'monitor the impact of features we have recently launched and how they have moved our team kpis', 'you’ll work side-by-side with product, engineering and finance to create a strong understanding of our cost structure ensuring that your analysis and insights translate into action and a better experience or pricing for our customers', 'develop a strong understanding of the local payments industry and find opportunities that lead to changes in our partnership setup', 'you’ll need to build relationships with teams across the company, from finance and engineering to our customer support and operations.', 'be the go-to person for transferwise apac data and regularly present an update to the team on your new insights, costs and impact of product changes.', 'your work would be instrumental in successfully launching the transferwise card in asia pacific, potentially reaching millions of customers, bringing a truly revolutionary to the market.', 'you would lead our effort in making our transferwise card a truly sustainable product, a rarity in the card industry.', 'we only reach 2% of our potential customers in apac. you would be at the center of the next phase of growth of the company in the region, helping us launch new markets like india, thailand and malaysia.']
job_requirement_p: ['a bit about you', 'our people', 'at transferwise, you’ll be joining a movement of people who believe in a better, fairer, more transparent way of moving money around the world. you’ll collaborate to do your best work and take on problems that no one has looked at before.', 'if you’re keen to learn, grow, try new things and aren’t afraid of a bold plan, you’ll fit right in.']
job_requirement_li: ['experience with product analysis (examples of analysing customer data to inform successful product changes - using sql, excel, python etc to do this)', 'excellent communication skills - you can summarise the complex, and present data visually in a way that makes people say “got it!”', 'you go beyond the numbers and understand how the customer is using our product, combining data analysis with customer empathy', 'you live up to the transferwise values and have a deep knowledge of our product', 'you’re a self-starter who’s comfortable working autonomously and with teams located across our offices. you pick where your focus should be based on your knowledge of the product', 'analysts at transferwise pick the best tools for the job. besides solid sql and excel, you are familiar with either python or r, and you are keen to learn the tools needed for a given task', 'experience of working in card payment industry (schemes, acquirers, etc.) is a plus', 'if you’re interested in data science, we will have some small projects to start with']

job_description_p: ['canopy.cloud private wealth data platform is a big data platform that provides critical functionality for investment bank data analytics-driven understanding, getting to know micro investment strategies and legal / compliance function.', 'the main objective of the project is to design and implement critical data sourcing from global upstream systems into local data platform. project activities will include data discovery, preparing, reviewing and submitting cross-data approval request, establishing formal data governance and data quality processes for data flow, exposing apis, establishing connectivity between source systems and canopy data platform and technical ingestion of the upstream data into the platform. the main areas are: pdf to excel extraction, image processing, nlp and anomaly detection.', 'after the product is developed and rolled out, the consultant will serve as the sme, providing support to the matching algorithms and data quality for the application.']

job_description_p: ['the statistics unit serves as a supporting platform to provide consultations and assist in planning and design of studies, grant proposals, statistical analysis and reporting in manuscripts for all research themes across seri and snec. the team has worked on analyses in large-scale population-based studies in the singapore epidemiology of eye diseases (seed) program, clinical trials, emr data and genome-wide association studies.\xa0', 'we have an established reputation for being a leading centre for bio-statistical methodology relevant to eye research. our work involves extensive, inter-institutional and often international, collaborations, undertaking research in applied projects and in statistical methodology.', 'responsibilities']
job_description_li: ['data quality controls and management, statistical analysis for clinical and images data ', 'assist in study execution, managing project timelines, and participate in the preparation of abstracts, posters and presentations', 'compilation of data, summarizing and interpreting results of the analysis in reports and journal articles', 'design analytical solutions/experiments to solve various clinical, operational and business problems through directly engaging in the 3-pillars of clinical, research and education work', 'build and deploy machine learning algorithms, advanced analytics and data visualization across the 3-pillars', 'support enterprise data architecture and governance in developing and transforming the current proprietary erp system into implementable information and solutions ', 'partner with a multi-disciplinary clinical, it, finance and operations team to provide deep expertise and advisory on data analytics needs and aligned to business priorities on data transformation', 'mentoring and managing junior statisticians']

job_description_p: ['talend is a rapidly growing leader in the cloud, data and application integration space. we\xa0are a global company with offices in redwood city, paris, london, bonn, beijing, tokyo, singapore, sydney, and bangalore. our customers are thought leaders\xa0in\xa0data integration, cloud, and\xa0big data, and they represent\xa0some of the biggest and best\xa0names\xa0in retail, financial services, consumer products, and business services.', 'we enable data driven companies to be more effective at what they do by providing them with the tools, infrastructure, and guidance to make informed business decisions. our architecture and technology uniquely position us to take advantage of constant innovation in data and processing technologies, such as hadoop and spark. as a result, we provide the fastest, most scalable data integration platform in the industry, and we support big data natively.\xa0data, analytics, and predictable forecasts are becoming ever more important to us as our company reaches its next phase of maturity and reporting requirements.']
job_description_li: [None]
job_requirement_p: ['who you are:', 'desirable skills and experience:']
job_requirement_li: ['a customer-centric, intellectually curious, bright, energetic person with the ability to drive the successful delivery of talend services.', 'a true lover of data.', 'a thought leader who can work in a fast-paced environment and consistently meet internal and external deadlines', 'someone who is energized by finding a solution to a problem.', 'a consultant with deep experience in data integration, application integration, cloud infrastructure (aws, google, or azure) or big data (extra credit for more than one)', 'a team player who creates a culture that understands that our internal standards and expectations need to be higher than our customers’', 'you think, every day, about how you can improve the experience of your customers', 'you have experience in the arena of big data and are looking for the next “big thing”', "requires a bachelor's degree in computer science or a related area and 5 years of experience in the field, in a related area or a master’s degree", 'skills in java, sql, xml and tomcat', 'must have some exposure to data integration, preferably with talend’s products', 'preferred experience in eclipse, sql and oracle environments', 'knowledge in installation, configuration, optimization in hadoop', 'understand how and when to apply mapreduce', 'knowledge in nosql technologies (mongo, couchdb, cassandra, neo4j)', 'strong understanding of integration design patterns & best practices', 'experience in designing and building integrations between multiple on premises and/or cloud hosted systems', 'technical aggressiveness, demonstrated ability to learn new technologies and business requirements', 'demonstrated creative problem-solving ability', 'experience leading and managing engagements and implementations', 'exceptional verbal, presentation, and written communication skills', 'ability to work effectively independently as well as in a team environment']

job_description_p: ['strategic account executive (malaysia)\n \xa0', 'talend is a rapidly growing leader in the cloud, data and application integration space. we\xa0are a global company with offices in redwood city, paris, london, bonn, beijing, tokyo, singapore, sydney, and bangalore. our customers are thought leaders\xa0in\xa0data integration, cloud, and\xa0big data, and they represent\xa0some of the biggest and best\xa0names\xa0in retail, financial services, consumer products, and business services.', 'we enable data driven companies to be more effective at what they do by providing them with the tools, infrastructure, and guidance to make informed business decisions. our architecture and technology uniquely position us to take advantage of constant innovation in data and processing technologies, such as hadoop and spark. as a result, we provide the fastest, most scalable data integration platform in the industry, and we support big data natively.\xa0data, analytics, and predictable forecasts are becoming ever more important to us as our company reaches its next phase of maturity and reporting requirements.']

job_requirement_p:
['talend is hiring a results driven account executive who have strong sales and communications skills with a basic understanding of technology infrastructure and business process focusing on the malaysian market. we also look for the right attitude and aptitude in a candidate around a customer’s overall success.', 'you will be responsible for prospecting, generating opportunities, closing new business and growing the existing customer base and will be recognized for your achievements and milestones. this is a fantastic opportunity for results-oriented individuals that enjoy working in a fast paced, competitive (in a fun way of course), yet collaborative work environment.\xa0', 'responsibilities:', 'sell talend’s comprehensive enterprise solutions via prospecting and relationship building.', 'understand and effectively communicate talend’s value proposition.', 'ability to build trusted rapport with cxo level customer contacts', 'insightful and strategic territory planning which focuses in building a strong pipeline of opportunities', 'manage numerous opportunities concurrently and strategically through varied sales stages to closure, while mitigating risk and maximizing upside', 'manage forecasts, close deals, and track customer data using company standard crm tools', 'grow existing business relationships and acquire new business', 'meet and exceed your assigned sales quota and performance objectives', 'continue to build your personal skillset – you can never learn enough!', '
 required skills:', '\xa0', 'talend is an equal opportunity employer committed to making all employment decisions on the basis of merit, capability and equality of opportunity, and without regard to race/ethnicity, gender, pregnancy, gender identity or expression, color, creed, religion, national origin, age, disability, marital status (including domestic partnerships and civil unions), sexual orientation, military veteran status, unemployment status, or any other basis prohibited by federal, state or local law, or any other characteristic that has no bearing on a person’s ability to perform his or her job.', '\xa0', "talend is a 1000+ employee, big data integration software company with deep open source roots. we believe in\xa0empowering organizations of any size to turn data into a strategic asset and competitive differentiator to enable companies to act with real-time insight about their business and customers.\xa0
 
 if you are a\xa0hungry for success, has a positive attitude, fun personality,enjoys winning as team, super sales professional that our clients can't say no to. we want you!\xa0\xa0"]
job_requirement_li: [' sell talend’s comprehensive enterprise solutions via prospecting and relationship building. ', ' understand and effectively communicate talend’s value proposition. ', ' ability to build trusted rapport with cxo level customer contacts ', ' insightful and strategic territory planning which focuses in building a strong pipeline of opportunities ', ' manage numerous opportunities concurrently and strategically through varied sales stages to closure, while mitigating risk and maximizing upside ', ' manage forecasts, close deals, and track customer data using company standard crm tools ', ' grow existing business relationships and acquire new business ', ' meet and exceed your assigned sales quota and performance objectives ', ' continue to build your personal skillset – you can never learn enough! ', '8+ years of successful experience selling enterprise software and services to accounts in the asean market.', 'prior sales experience in big data, data integration, data integrity solutions would be a plus.\xa0', 'knowledge and passion for open source solutions', 'demonstrated market knowledge of competitive opportunities', 'background of exceptional quota attainment', 'excellent communication skills', 'ability to thrive in a start up environment and enjoy the fast dynamic pace of the growing business.\xa0', 'bachelor’s degree required, additional education preferred', 'ability to thrive in a fast-paced, high-growth environment', 'position is to be based in malaysia, kuala lumpur']

job_description_p: ['are you a passionate linux system engineer, or devops specialist interested in working for a highly agile and growing tech company? would you like to become part of a collaborative, data analytics start-up engaged with some of the largest and most interesting datasets in the world?', '\xa0', 'who are teralytics?', 'teralytics is a fast-growing technology start-up with great ambitions in supporting the emerging big data economy. our products transform the way industries, governments and our society works, utilising real-time data from over 350 million people across multiple countries.', 'we offer our employees unique learning opportunities and the chance to work with technologies such as ansible, docker, mesos, hadoop, scala and spark. teralytics is funded by international venture capital firms who previously invested in companies such as facebook, spotify, skype and airbnb.\xa0', '\xa0', 'your role']
job_description_li: ['manage and monitor a multi-datacenter environment with an infrastructure as code methodology', 'build automation to prevent problem recurrence and to reduce deployment times and errors', 'participate in the designs of distributed systems architectures', 'ensure scalability, availability and performance of teralytics software stack', 'engage in service capacity planning and demand forecasting', 'maintain security, backup, and redundancy strategies']
job_requirement_p: ['required experience:', 'beneficial:']
job_requirement_li: ['ms degree in computer science or related technical field, or equivalent practical experience', 'hands-on experience with linux and basic knowledge of linux internals', 'hands-on experience with docker', 'understanding of infrastructure as code principles and experience with configuration management tools (preferably ansible)', 'interest in staying up-to-date and working with the most recent technologies (docker, mesos, prometheus, marathon, ansible...)', 'deep willingness to learn and become an expert in site reliability engineering practices', 'experience with distributed systems (mesos, hdfs, ceph, marathon)', 'knowledgeable about linux networking (tcp/ip stack) and security', 'contributions to relevant open-source projects']

["~ analyse employee demographics and associated risk exposure

 ~ suggest peer companies and competitors of the organization
 ~ verify that submitted claims are covered under organisation's benefit schemes"]

job_description_li: ['responsible for the development and execution of digital marketing strategies and programs to achieve business objectives, which can include increasing the brand’s presence and penetration on social media channels, increasing website traffic using sem/seo.', 'responsible for the planning, development and execution of the company’s e-commerce strategies and programs to drive the business through key marketing channels.', 'work closely with the operations team to plan and implement digital marketing programs and engagement campaigns on social media, email marketing and website to achieve business objectives.', 'to manage and maintain the e-commerce website and social media platforms with up-to-date content, and spearhead improvements on design and content to increase conversion online.', 'to identify and develop new opportunities for e-commerce business growth on an on-going basis.', 'to source and manage online advertising opportunities, partnerships with web owners and content providers (eg. websites, bloggers etc).', 'to track and measure the success of digital marketing campaigns and strategies using data analytics, and ensure improvement actions are implemented.', 'to evaluate and ensure that all digital marketing strategies and campaigns help to improve customer engagement and customer retention via digital and mobile platforms.', 'to stay up-to-date on the latest digital marketing trends, review technologies and explore new developments in the digital landscape to find ways to deliver the business objectives more effectively.']

job_description_p: ['overview of policy, research and surveillance division ', 'advance the transformation of health promotion through the delivery of internationally-recognised and high-performing policies, evidence and intelligence.', 'overview of programme evaluation department', 'to advance the transformation of health promotion through the adoption of a systems and multi-disciplinary approach to programme evaluation, leveraging new data', 'summary objective of role ', 'the job holder will drive and lead programme analytics with a focus on delivering measurable outcomes for programme evaluation and influencing business strategies. this would be done through working as part of dynamic business and marketing teams to come up with well-articulated measurement framework and impact assessment strategy as well as driving integration and cross-analytics of multiple big datasets (e.g. programmatic, surveillance, disease and app-based data).', 'responsibilities ', 'requirements ']
job_description_li: ['lead a team to set up and implement analytics to drive programme evaluation to inform hpb’s strategies and facilitate an assessment of the impact of hpb’s work on the nation’s health outcomes', 'drive the application of big data collected from population level programmes to develop new use cases that can help drive hpb’s goal of delivering personalised behavioural nudges across programmes and marketing', 'drive collaborations and partnerships across public and private sector partners to advance and widen health promotion in broader research agenda', 'qualifications in data analytics, statistics, public health, epidemiology or related field, or candidates with other disciplines with relevant experience are welcomed to apply', 'minimum 7 years of relevant experience in data analytics, with at least 2 years in supervisory capacity', 'have worked with large data sets including statistical analysis, data visualisation or data mining.', 'working knowledge of forecasting/predictive modelling tools would be a plus', 'proficient in the use of data visualisation tools (e.g. tableau, microsoft power bi), ms excel (advanced), spss, stats or equivalent analytics tools;', 'strong communication skills with proven track record in leading and collaborating with business stakeholders independently both within and outside of the organisation']

job_description_li: ['assist internal audit head to define it audit universe and draft annual it risk-based audit plan.', 'lead it audit planning and development of audit programs.', 'evaluate adequacy and effectiveness of it controls (general and application controls).', 'determine compliance with company it policies, best practices, standards and government regulations.', 'draft concise audit reports in english for all levels of key stakeholders including senior management.', 'draft audit work papers to support audit test work and conclusions. review audit team’s documentation to ensure quality.', 'enhance it control processes by identifying improvement opportunities and work together with it stakeholders to develop appropriate remediation plans.', 'establish strong working relationships with key stakeholders and business internal auditors.', 'participate in it related projects including process automation, data analytics and ad hoc investigations.']
job_requirement_p: [None]
job_requirement_li: ['degree holder in information technology/computer engineering from a recognized institution.', '4 - 8 years of experience in it auditing with public accounting firm, preferably with prior audit exposure in electronics manufacturing services domain.', 'experience in performing audits for compliance with cobit framework and itil practices.', 'subject matter expertise in one or more following is desirable: information security, data privacy, software development, operating system and sap audits.', 'data analytics experience is a significant advantage. experience in data analytics software including audit command language (acl) and tableau are desired.', 'excellent command of written and verbal english communication skills for interaction with all levels of stakeholders including senior management. ability to speak and read bahasa malay or mandarin is desirable as the incumbent will be involved in audits of subsidiaries in malaysia and china.', 'willing to travel internationally to factories and offices in malaysia, china, united states and spain. traveling is equivalent and/or less than 50%.', 'professional certification in cism, cisa, cissp, cia or cfe is preferred']
